T02D2590:225a-1: shr'i manydzu badzra au da ya manda lo bi dhi sarba satva hi ta ba ha n'a ma //
T02D2590:225a-3: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2590:225a-4: cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba bskyed
T02D2590:225a-6: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2590:225a-7: mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2590:225a-8: dpal ldan dngos grub thabs chen bdag nyid dri med shes rab btsun mo yi ni sku yis 'khyud //
T02D2590:225a-9: nam mkha' khyab pa'i thub dbang sprul ba'i tshogs kyis 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dod stsol mdzad //
T02D2590:225a-10: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dga' ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bde ba'i rol ba'i nyams ni 'phro mdzad pa //
T02D2590:225a-11: 'jam pa yi ni mchog la btud de 'gro bas de yi dkyil 'khor mnyes bya rab bshad bya //
T02D2590:225a-12: mi brtan mi nyid rnyed dka' de bas kyang //
T02D2590:225a-13: bshes gnyen mchog phrad dga' ston rab rnyed dka' //
T02D2590:225b-0: de phyir @225b bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul //
T02D2590:225b-1: sring gsum phan byed lam la brten par gyis //
T02D2590:225b-2: sdug bsngal du mas bcom zhing mya ngan gnas //
T02D2590:225b-3: 'gro ba mgon med bltas nas brtser ldan bas //
T02D2590:225b-4: sngags tshul 'di yi don la brten bya ste //
T02D2590:225b-5: dam pa rnams la gzhan don las mchog med ;
T02D2590:225b-6: / rang gi lto ba tsam zhig 'gengs 'dod pa //
T02D2590:225b-7: 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin 'di yin gyi //
T02D2590:225b-8: rang lus 'jig na'ang gzhan don 'dod gyur pa //
T02D2590:225b-9: sngon med rmad 'di sa steng 'ga' yi yin //
T02D2590:225b-10: lus can yid kyi rang dbang dag gis 'jug /'di dag yongs ye yid kyi dbang gyur yin //
T02D2590:225b-11: srid dang rnam grol de nyid rnam rol na //
T02D2590:225b-12: bcos bla'ang blo gros nor ldan ci phyir thogs //
T02D2590:225b-13: phyi rol gnas kyang de nyid ga la 'gro //
T02D2590:225b-14: 'on te gnas kyang yid ni rnam par grol //
T02D2590:225b-15: de ltas don du yongs 'dzin don med de //
T02D2590:225b-16: yid nyid kun du bya dang byed pa yin //
T02D2590:225b-17: dper na da du ra yi mthu yis ni //
T02D2590:225b-18: 'ga' yis sa gzhi gser gyi rang bzhin mthong //
T02D2590:225b-19: de bzhin yid kyang sngags sogs stobs kyis ni //
T02D2590:225b-20: sna tshogs snang ba rnam par dag par 'gyur //
T02D2590:225b-21: de la slob dpon theg pa chen po yi //
T02D2590:225b-22: zab cing rgya che'i chos ni rtogs pa dang //
T02D2590:225b-23: de nyid la ni rtag tu mngon par dga' //
T02D2590:225b-24: gsang ba'i de nyid don ni sdud par byed //
T02D2590:225b-25: sna tshogs las kyi rlung gis bskyod //
T02D2590:225b-26: sdug bsngal dba' klong srid pa'i mtshor //
T02D2590:225b-27: 'gro kun nub par mthong nas ni //
T02D2590:225b-28: sdug bsngal de nyid dag gis gdungs //
T02D2590:225b-29: de nyid gdon par rab dad cing //
T02D2590:225b-30: byang chub tu ni nges byas la //
T02D2590:225b-31: dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul dra ba yis //
T02D2590:225b-32: rgyud gsungs dam tshig rab srung byed //
T02D2590:225b-33: phyi dang gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur //
T02D2590:225b-34: rnam par mi rtog rnam dag blo //
T02D2590:225b-36: phyag rgya stang stabs 'dug stangs dang //
T02D2590:225b-37: zlas dang sbyin sreg de bzhin mchod //
T02D2590:225b-38: las kyi sbyor dang nye bsdu ba'o //
T02D2590:225b-39: de ltar de nyid bcu shes shing //
T02D2590:225b-40: dman pa'i sems ni smod byed pa //
T02D2590:225b-41: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02D2590:225b-42: bzod ldan drang zhing g-yo sgyur med //
T02D2590:225b-43: gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes //
T02D2590:226a-2: brtser ldan bstan bcos rnams la mkhas //
T02D2590:226a-3: spro ba che zhing snying stobs che //
T02D2590:226a-4: rag pa zlos shing shin tu bsdams //
T02D2590:226a-5: byams dang snying rje dag pa'i bdag //
T02D2590:226a-6: sems can kun la ser sna med //
T02D2590:226a-7: srid pa'i longs spyod la mi chags //
T02D2590:226a-8: sngags kyi tshul la the tshom med //
T02D2590:226a-9: rang gi yid ni nyams dga'i gnas //
T02D2590:226a-10: phyogs dgar rnam par gnas nas nim //
T02D2590:226a-11: sgyu ma rmi lam brag ca dang //
T02D2590:226a-12: dril za'i grong khyer lta bur ni //
T02D2590:226a-13: 'gro ba thams cad rnam bsgoms la //
T02D2590:226a-14: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu bsgrub //
T02D2590:226a-15: ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan ldan //
T02D2590:226a-16: blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2590:226a-17: de nyid slob ma sdud pa dang /
T02D2590:226a-18: rgyud rnams ston par 'os pa yin //
T02D2590:226a-19: de nyid kyis ni sngags byin pa //
T02D2590:226a-20: bya bar ldan la rab tu 'grub //
T02D2590:226a-21: slob ma'ang yon tan de 'dra ba'am //
T02D2590:226a-22: cung zad dman pas dpal ldan rgyud /
T02D2590:226a-24: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //
T02D2590:226a-25: gzhan du slob dpon slob ma dag //
T02D2590:226a-27: 'jig rten gsum gyis dpyas pa dang //
T02D2590:226a-29: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2590:226a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchog //
T02D2590:226a-31: dam tshig shes rab can gyis bsrung //
T02D2590:226a-32: srog gi phyir yang dor mi bya //
T02D2590:226a-34: legs par bris pa nyid rung gi //
T02D2590:226a-35: bar ma dor gyur dngos pos ni //
T02D2590:226a-36: don med par ni ltung bar 'gyur //
T02D2590:226a-37: de la slob dpon slob mas gang gi tshe //
T02D2590:226a-38: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gsol ba btab na /
T02D2590:226a-39: de'i tshe dag gis sems can gyi khams 'di dag
T02D2590:226a-40: thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po'i
T02D2590:226a-41: gnas la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes lhag pa'i
T02D2590:226a-43: khyed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad thams cad tshogs par gyur tam //
T02D2590:226a-44: 'on te ma yin zhe slob ma la dri bar bya'o //
T02D2590:226a-45: gal te cung zad ni tshogs la cung zad ni ma yin no zhes zer na //
T02D2590:226a-46: de'i tshe de'i lte bar nyi ma dkyil 'khor la
T02D2590:226a-47: gnas pa'i yi ge h'um gi 'od zer rnams kyis
T02D2590:226b-0: snying gar gnas pa'i @226b yi ge kam las byung
T02D2590:226b-1: ba'i sdig pa mdog gnag cing mi sdug pa sha
T02D2590:226b-2: za lta bur sna'i rtse mor phyung ba dang /
T02D2590:226b-3: yi ge h'um de yang snying gar phyin te //
T02D2590:226b-4: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sku g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa //
T02D2590:226b-5: mche ba gtsigs pa gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02D2590:226b-7: thugs kar mche ba dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub ston pa //
T02D2590:226b-8: phyag g-yas na mche ba bsnams pa bsams la phyung ste //
T02D2590:226b-9: aom badzra yaksha kro dha kh'a da kh'a da //
T02D2590:226b-10: sarbba p'a pam aa sya h'um phat ces bya bas des sdig pa thams cad zos nas //
T02D2590:226b-11: slob ma de yang yi ge sa las kun du bzang po'i skur rnam par bsams la /
T02D2590:226b-12: 'og nas bshad pa'i bdung rtsi thab sbyor gyi tshul gyis de'i sems kyi bgegs phur bus btab la //
T02D2590:226b-13: de'i 'od zer 'jigs pa stong phrag gis gdug pa thams cad yang dag par bsregs la//
T02D2590:226b-14: slob pa'i sems mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2590:226b-15: yi ge aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2590:226b-16: la dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las byung ba'i
T02D2590:226b-17: las kyi rdo rje yang der gnas par bsam par
T02D2590:226b-18: bya'o // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bya ba rnams kyi phyir 'bad par bya'o //
T02D2590:226b-19: dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar //
T02D2590:226b-20: yang dag brtag par su yis nus //
T02D2590:226b-21: rang gi lha yis sbyor ba yis //
T02D2590:226b-24: dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor ba bya bar bshad do //
T02D2590:226b-25: de la dang por ra zhig bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags rjes su dran par byas la //
T02D2590:226b-26: mal nas langs te gdong bkru ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2590:226b-27: bya ba thams cad byas nas// snga dro'i dus su
T02D2590:226b-28: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur dang h'um phat ces
T02D2590:226b-29: bya bas bgegs rnams bskrad la //
T02D2590:226b-31: stan nang tshangs can la sogs par 'dug la //
T02D2590:226b-32: yi ge aa dang h'um gnyis las zla ba dang //
T02D2590:226b-33: rdo rje rim bzhin lag pa gnyis su bsams la //
T02D2590:226b-34: gung mo dang mdzub mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung dang the bo rnams su //
T02D2590:226b-35: aom h'um tr'am a'a:kham zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga
T02D2590:226b-36: rim bzhin du bkod la rdo rje thal mo bcings
T02D2590:226b-37: te // aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta shan s'i d'a /
T02D2590:226b-38: sarbba sa tva na ma sarbba siddha ya /
T02D2590:227a-3: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharmm'a:sva bh'a shuddho& ham//
T02D2590:227a-4: zhes bzhag la rang gi mgor dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2590:227a-5: de nyid kyis bgegs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes bsam par bya ste //
T02D2590:227a-6: gang 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag
T02D2590:227a-7: par lhag par mos pa la bgegs rnams 'byung ba
T02D2590:227a-8: 'di ni gnas med cing skabs med de //
T02D2590:227a-9: bgegs la sogs pa ni tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2590:227a-10: gal te de lta na yang yid mgu ba rma
T02D2590:227a-11: gyur na de'i tshe skad cig gis dpal rnam par
T02D2590:227a-12: snang mdzad du bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02D2590:227a-13: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor
T02D2590:227a-14: bgegs ma lus pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa
T02D2590:227a-15: // 'bar ba stong phrag gis 'jigs su rung ba //
T02D2590:227a-16: lte ba man chad rtse gcig pa lta bu la
T02D2590:227a-17: sku stod khro bo'i dbyibs can la 'og nas bshad
T02D2590:227a-19: phyag mtshan dang ldan par bsams la /
T02D2590:227a-20: lhag khang pa'i dbus su sngags 'di gdab par bya'o /
T02D2590:227a-22: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02D2590:227a-24: k'i ka ya k'i la ya /
T02D2590:227a-27: badzra k'i la ya badzra dha r'a dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya /
T02D2590:227a-28: b'aka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D2590:227a-29: 'og tu sa gzhi'i gtan pa la thug gi bar
T02D2590:227a-30: du bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun du phur bus btab
T02D2590:227a-31: la // der gtogs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kun
T02D2590:227a-32: nas sreg par byed pa'i phur bus bgegs rnams bskrad
T02D2590:227a-33: la // nas // de'i steng du yi ge aam
T02D2590:227a-34: las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskal pa me
T02D2590:227a-35: ltar 'bar ba'i 'od can nyi ma byed ba'i 'od
T02D2590:227a-37: shar dang nub dang byang dang //
T02D2590:227a-38: lho'i phyogs dang mtshams rnams su sngar bshad pa'i phur bu rnam par bsams nas /
T02D2590:227a-39: dbus ma'i phur bu'i nyi ma'i gzugs las 'od phyung nas /
T02D2590:227a-40: ngos kyi phur bu rnams la de dag phan tshun
T02D2590:227a-41: du 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'dres par gyur bas bla
T02D2590:227a-42: re bzhin du stug por gyur pa /
T02D2590:227a-43: 'og tu yang de bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:227a-44: yang na de bzhin bzhin du dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas la /
T02D2590:227a-45: h'um las dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad mdun du 'dug ste /
T02D2590:227b-0: aom sumbha ni sumbha zhes bya ba @227b la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bka' bsgo pa dang //
T02D2590:227b-1: de las lha la sogs pa'i bgegs ma lus pa bkug par gyur nas //
T02D2590:227b-2: rang gi phyogs su gnas par rnam par bsams la //
T02D2590:227b-3: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor
T02D2590:227b-4: phyag na thob bsnams nas aom gha gha zhes bya
T02D2590:227b-5: ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi bka' bsgo zhing khro
T02D2590:227b-6: bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i khro bo'i phur bus
T02D2590:227b-7: spyi bo nas brdungs pa dang //
T02D2590:227b-8: shar phyogs su khyab 'jug dang brgya byin zhes bya ba 'khor lo dang rdo rje thogs pa //
T02D2590:227b-10: ser po nam mkha'i lding dang //
T02D2590:227b-11: sa srung la zhon pa'i lha gnyis g-yog dang 'khor
T02D2590:227b-12: du bcas pa phur bus btab par bsam par bya'o
T02D2590:227b-13: // de bzhin du bdud rtsi thab sbyor phyag na rdo rje'i thob bsnams pa dang //
T02D2590:227b-14: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyis lhor gshin rje lag na dbyug pa thogs pa //
T02D2590:227b-15: kha dog ga nag pa ma he la zhon pa 'khor dang bcas pa phur bus btab pa dang //
T02D2590:227b-16: stobs po ches nub tu chu lha lag na zhags
T02D2590:227b-17: pa thogs pa zla ba lta bu'i mdog can sbrul
T02D2590:227b-18: la zhon pa'o // 'dod pa'i rgyal pos me'i phyogs
T02D2590:227b-19: su me lha gundhe dang bgrang phreng thogs pa kha
T02D2590:227b-20: dog dmar por skyes la zhon pa /
T02D2590:227b-21: drang srong rnams kyis bskor ba'o ;
T02D2590:227b-22: / khro bo padma mthar byed kyis bden bral gyi
T02D2590:227b-23: phyogs su bden bral mdog char sprin lta nag po
T02D2590:227b-24: // ral gri thogs pa yi dags la zhon pa //
T02D2590:227b-25: srin po rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D2590:227b-26: khro bo chen po dbyug sngon gyis rlung gi phyogs
T02D2590:227b-27: su rlung lha du ba'i mdog can rgyal mtshan thogs
T02D2590:227b-28: pa / ri dags sngo bsangs la zhon pa'o //
T02D2590:227b-29: khro bo mi g-yo bas dbang ldan kyi phyogs su
T02D2590:227b-30: dbang ldan mdog dkar po mdung rtse gsum pa thogs
T02D2590:227b-31: pa khyu mchog la zhon pa //
T02D2590:227b-32: zla ba kham pas dbu rgyan byas pa'o /
T02D2590:227b-33: khro bo'i gnod mdzes kyi steng du tshangs pa dang //
T02D2590:227b-34: nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa mdog ser po dang //
T02D2590:227b-40: khro bo rdo rjes 'og gis sa'i 'og tu lha
T02D2590:227b-41: ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris sku mdog
T02D2590:227b-42: ljang gu lag na ral gri thogs pa shin rta
T02D2590:228a-0: la zhon pa'o // khro bo chen @228a * //
T02D2590:228a-1: po bgegs mthar byed rang nyid kyi byang du lus ngan po dang //
T02D2590:228a-2: tshogs kyi bdag po mdog dkar po dang /
T02D2590:228a-4: la du lag na thogs pa mi dang byi la la zhon pa /
T02D2590:228a-6: bgegs ma lus pa'i bdag por gyur pa /
T02D2590:228a-7: phur bus btab pa rab tu bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:228a-8: khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang lte ba man
T02D2590:228a-9: chad sku smad kyi cha rdo rje'i rtse mo lta
T02D2590:228a-10: bu sku stod khro bo'i dbyibs can la //
T02D2590:228a-11: 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang
T02D2590:228a-12: ldan pas khyab 'jug la sogs pa bu dang bu
T02D2590:228a-14: 'khor dang cas pa phur bus btab cing khro bo'i
T02D2590:228a-15: 'od zer rnams kyis lus rnam par yang bsam par
T02D2590:228a-16: bya'o // de nas yi ge ram las byung ba'i
T02D2590:228a-17: me'i dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas phyogs bcing ba dang
T02D2590:228a-18: bya'o // / yi ge lam las byung ba'i dbang
T02D2590:228a-19: chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser pos phyogs kyi nang du
T02D2590:228a-21: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar snang gtams pas //
T02D2590:228a-22: phur ba'i nang du kun nas ra ba bya ba
T02D2590:228a-23: dang yi ge ram las byung ba'i rdo rje dra
T02D2590:228a-24: ba rab tu 'bar ba'i me ltar snang zhing 'bar
T02D2590:228a-25: ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba kun du 'khrug pa ra
T02D2590:228a-26: ba'i nang du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:228a-27: de ltar mdor bsdus pa dang //
T02D2590:228a-28: bar ma dang rgya chen po ste /
T02D2590:228a-29: bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnams las gang du mngon par 'dod pa de nyid bya'o //
T02D2590:228a-30: de nas yi ge hr'i:las lkog mar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la //
T02D2590:228a-31: lce'i padma'i 'dab ma la h'um las byung ba'i rdo
T02D2590:228a-32: rje gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral bas dkar
T02D2590:228a-33: ba bsams te // badzra dzi hva zhes bya bas
T02D2590:228a-34: byin gyis brlab snas ras ris la sogs par bzhugs
T02D2590:228a-35: pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang //
T02D2590:228a-36: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2590:228a-37: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs thams cad du
T02D2590:228a-38: dmigs la mchog tu gus pas snying gar thal mo
T02D2590:228a-40: pus mo'i lha ngas la bzhag nas /
T02D2590:228a-41: phyi'i mchod pa ci 'byor rnams dang //
T02D2590:228a-42: aom sarbba bid p'u ra p'u ra /
T02D2590:228a-43: aa barta ya aa barta ho zhes bya ba dang //
T02D2590:228a-44: yid kyis mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs pas
T02D2590:228b-0: kyang @228b yang dag par mchod la dngos po thams
T02D2590:228b-1: cad phyag byas nas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs
T02D2590:228b-2: pa bya'o // dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2590:228b-3: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D2590:228b-4: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
T02D2590:228b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D2590:228b-6: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po dag //
T02D2590:228b-7: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02D2590:228b-8: byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i //
T02D2590:228b-9: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-10: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D2590:228b-11: sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02D2590:228b-12: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D2590:228b-13: sems can don ni byed pa gsum //
T02D2590:228b-14: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-15: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2590:228b-16: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2590:228b-17: ded nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-18: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2590:228b-19: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2590:228b-20: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-21: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-22: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2590:228b-23: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2590:228b-24: yin re zhing ni lan drug tu //
T02D2590:228b-25: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D2590:228b-26: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D2590:228b-27: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02D2590:228b-28: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02D2590:228b-29: dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzug las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2590:228b-30: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D2590:228b-31: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-32: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-33: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2590:228b-34: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02D2590:228b-35: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2590:228b-36: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung ;
T02D2590:228b-37: / ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-38: ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-39: dbugs ma phyin pa dbyugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2590:228b-41: bdag ni dge ba'i las 'di yis //
T02D2590:228b-42: sangs rgyas nyid ni rtogs gyur nas //
T02D2590:228b-43: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' med las ;
T02D2590:228b-44: /'gro ba thams cad gdon par bgyi //
T02D2590:228b-45: de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rang
T02D2590:228b-46: gi sngags dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D2590:228b-47: pa'i rang gi lha'i rang bzhin 'od kyi tshogs dpag
T02D2590:228b-48: tu med pa rnam par 'phro ba bkod la //
T02D2590:229a-0: de nyid yid la zlos shing sems rnam par sbyang bar @229a * //
T02D2590:229a-2: dngos po 'di dag ma skyed pas //
T02D2590:229a-3: chos rnams med cing chos can med //
T02D2590:229a-4: nam mkha' lta bur dmigs med de //
T02D2590:229a-7: de'i don la lhag par mos pas thog ma med
T02D2590:229a-8: pa'i dus can gyi phyin ci log gi rtog pa'i
T02D2590:229a-9: bag chags kyi sa bon bsal la //
T02D2590:229a-10: 'gro ba 'di dag ma lus pa dang //
T02D2590:229a-11: rang gi lus dang rdul phra rab tu rnam par bshig la //
T02D2590:229a-12: rdul phra rab rnams kyang ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2590:229a-13: brtags pa las 'das pas dngos po med pas rang
T02D2590:229a-14: bzhin med par rnam par bsgoms la //
T02D2590:229a-15: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a:zhes bya ba dang thal mo lan gsum brdabs te //
T02D2590:229a-16: rang bzhin gyis dag par mos la /
T02D2590:229a-17: rang gi sems gdod ma nas ma skyes pa rang
T02D2590:229a-18: bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba phung po dang khams dang
T02D2590:229a-19: skye mched la sogs pa las rnam par grol ba
T02D2590:229a-20: // de'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid rang gi
T02D2590:229a-21: sngags tsam la yi ge ho dang spel bar bsams
T02D2590:229a-22: // la // aom las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D2590:229a-23: rnam par snang mdzad ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhal
T02D2590:229a-24: yas khang gi dbus na bzhugs pa rang gi dam
T02D2590:229a-25: tshig gi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa
T02D2590:229a-26: // la // / ma lus pa'i lha rnams kyi
T02D2590:229a-27: 'khor lo'i nang du chud pa mdun du bzhugs par
T02D2590:229a-28: // la // / bsams nas / aom tsitta pra ti bya dham k'a ro mi zhes brjod do //
T02D2590:229a-29: 'di de byang chub bde mchog ste /
T02D2590:229a-30: 'di las gzhan pa'i bde mchog med //
T02D2590:229a-31: de thob par ni 'dod bzhin du //
T02D2590:229a-32: de nas dri za'i sems can 'dra //
T02D2590:229a-33: nye bar len pa'i rgyu yis ni //
T02D2590:229a-34: phra ba'i sbyor ba nyid 'dzin bzhin //
T02D2590:229a-35: rang bdag zhal nas rgya padmar //
T02D2590:229a-36: skyes pa'i dus su blo yi zhugs //
T02D2590:229a-37: 'dod chags chen po'i me gzugs su //
T02D2590:229a-38: ra ni chu skyes su legs sam //
T02D2590:229a-39: de yi 'od kyi mthu yis ni //
T02D2590:229a-40: skad cig de las mar bum bzhin //
T02D2590:229a-41: byang chub sems zhu nyid gyur pa //
T02D2590:229a-42: sangs rgyas sras bcas pa yis gzigs //
T02D2590:229a-43: shin tu mnyam gzhag sems can bzhin //
T02D2590:229a-44: rang gi bdag nyid der dbyer med //
T02D2590:229a-45: sdug pa'i snying po dag pa che //
T02D2590:229a-46: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02D2590:229a-47: gnas ngan len ni kun las grol //
T02D2590:229a-48: rnam par rtog la sel ba'i mchog //
T02D2590:229b-0: nyon mongs @229b dri ma thams cad dag //
T02D2590:229b-1: zla ba lta bur sems tsam pa //
T02D2590:229b-2: sems tsam gyur pa'i sems can dang //
T02D2590:229b-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras bcas pa //
T02D2590:229b-4: de'i 'od lcags kyus bkug pa yis //
T02D2590:229b-5: rang gi sems kyis gcig tu bya //
T02D2590:229b-6: 'di sangs rgyas kun yon tan dang //
T02D2590:229b-7: sa dang pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02D2590:229b-8: aa sogs dbyangs yig lta bu ni //
T02D2590:229b-9: mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom par bya //
T02D2590:229b-10: rgyun ltar rang phyogs nas 'ongs te //
T02D2590:229b-11: dkar ba'i tshul gyis rnam par zhugs //
T02D2590:229b-12: bsod nams tshogs kyis nus pa nyis //
T02D2590:229b-13: sems tsam du ni rnam par bsam //
T02D2590:229b-14: 'di ltar snying rjes bskul ba ni //
T02D2590:229b-15: sa 'og bar du bsam par bya //
T02D2590:229b-16: kye ma sems can 'khor ba la //
T02D2590:229b-17: dga' bas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2590:229b-18: shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid bral //
T02D2590:229b-19: yun ring dus su yang yang 'khor //
T02D2590:229b-20: de rnams rdzogs par byang chub phyir //
T02D2590:229b-21: 'jam gsung rang nyid gyur par bya //
T02D2590:229b-22: aom bho dhi tsitta autpala da y'a mi //
T02D2590:229b-23: de las byung ba'i 'od tshogs las //
T02D2590:229b-24: ka sogs yi ge rgyas pa yis //
T02D2590:229b-25: rim gyis nye bar 'phel ba'i sems //
T02D2590:229b-26: sems can rjes su 'dzin byed cing //
T02D2590:229b-27: snying rje rjes chags las byung ba //
T02D2590:229b-28: byang chub sems kyi zla dkyil 'khor //
T02D2590:229b-29: dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag rdzogs ;
T02D2590:229b-30: / nyon mongs thams cad des 'joms yin //
T02D2590:229b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur sogs //
T02D2590:229b-32: sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa'i //
T02D2590:229b-33: kun du bzang po'i bdag nyid du //
T02D2590:229b-34: mthong nas rang la yig gsum dgod //
T02D2590:229b-35: spyi bor 'khor lo la gnas pa'i //
T02D2590:229b-36: gi ge aom ni kha dog ser//
T02D2590:229b-37: khar ni padma'i lte ba yi //
T02D2590:229b-38: dbus nas aa ni kha dog dkar //
T02D2590:229b-39: snying gar rdo rje de yi ni //
T02D2590:229b-40: lte ba la gnas yi ge h'um //
T02D2590:229b-41: sngon po 'od zer tshogs rnams ni //
T02D2590:229b-42: rnam par 'phro ba dgod par bya //
T02D2590:229b-43: rdo rje'i yi ge de rnams las //
T02D2590:229b-44: 'od kyi sprin rnams spros nas ni //
T02D2590:229b-45: sems can khams kun sbyang la sogs //
T02D2590:229b-47: aom las byung ba'i sku rdo rje'i //
T02D2590:229b-48: sprin las sku yi rdo rje ni /
T02D2590:229b-49: pam byung padma la bzhugs pa //
T02D2590:229b-50: dag pa'i shel ltar dri ma med //
T02D2590:229b-52: zhal gsum rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan //
T02D2590:230a-2: sprin las gsung gi rdo rje'i lcer //
T02D2590:230a-3: h'um las byung ba'i thugs rdo rjes //
T02D2590:230a-4: sprin las thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02D2590:230a-5: ting 'dzin byin rlabs snying ga yi //
T02D2590:230a-6: zla bar rnam par bsam par bya //
T02D2590:230a-7: de ltar yig gsum byin rlabs lus //
T02D2590:230a-8: snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba'i thugs //
T02D2590:230a-9: der ni ye shes tshogs kyi ni //
T02D2590:230a-11: de las byung ba'i autpala ni //
T02D2590:230a-13: de bus ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02D2590:230a-14: dgyes bskyed bya ba la bzhugs //
T02D2590:230a-15: de las byung ba'i 'od sprin las //
T02D2590:230a-16: sangs rgyas sprin las sngags pas spro //
T02D2590:230a-17: byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed //
T02D2590:230a-18: bde ba che la nges sbyar bas //
T02D2590:230a-19: 'jig rten ma lus legs sbyangs te //
T02D2590:230a-20: de bsdus nas ni gzhug pa bya //
T02D2590:230a-21: de kun yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D2590:230a-23: mgon po sangs rgyas kun gyis dngos //
T02D2590:230a-24: dngos po kun gyi srang bzhin can //
T02D2590:230a-25: srid pa sgyu ma ltar mkhyen pas //
T02D2590:230a-26: gzhon nu'i sku mdog gur kum 'dra //
T02D2590:230a-28: sgeg dang bcas pa'i nyams kyis rgyas //
T02D2590:230a-29: sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni //
T02D2590:230a-30: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs//
T02D2590:230a-31: sna tshogs rin chen 'dab ma bzang //
T02D2590:230a-32: padma'i rgyal po gdan du bya //
T02D2590:230a-33: sngo dang ser dang dkar po che //
T02D2590:230a-34: zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes //
T02D2590:230a-35: dpa' bo spyan gsum phyag drug pa //
T02D2590:230a-36: mchog tu dga' bas shin tu mdzes //
T02D2590:230a-37: mchog sbyin ral gri mda' rnams ni //
T02D2590:230a-38: g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams par mdzad //
T02D2590:230a-39: g-yon na shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D2590:230a-40: autpala sngo dang gzhu nyid do //
T02D2590:230a-41: sangs rgyas sprin chen spros pa yis //
T02D2590:230a-42: nam mkha' gtos kun khyab par mdzad //
T02D2590:230a-43: sna tshogs me tog gis cher mdzes //
T02D2590:230a-44: zur phud gsum gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D2590:230a-45: thog ma dbus dang mtha' las grol //
T02D2590:230a-46: byis pa'i rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D2590:230a-47: byams dang thugs rje sogs rgyu mthun //
T02D2590:230a-48: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can //
T02D2590:230a-49: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid //
T02D2590:230a-50: de ltar mkhas pas bdag nyid bsgom //
T02D2590:230a-51: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham zhes bya ba dang //
T02D2590:230b-1: rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang //
T02D2590:230b-2: nam mkha' rnams la spyan ma dang /
T02D2590:230b-5: sgrol ma dang nam mkha' rdo rje lam mam pam
T02D2590:230b-6: tam aam zhes bya ba'i sa bon rnams las rim
T02D2590:230b-12: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rnam par snang mdzad dang //
T02D2590:230b-16: me bskyod pa bhr'um a'am dzr'i kham h'um zhes bya bas so //
T02D2590:230b-22: yid kyi skye mched rnams la //
T02D2590:230b-23: kshim dzram kham gam shkam sam zhes bya ba las sa'i snying po dang /
T02D2590:230b-27: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D2590:230b-33: reg bya dang chos kyi skye mched rnams la //
T02D2590:230b-34: dza:h'um bam ho:kham ram zhes bya bas gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa lha mo rnams so //
T02D2590:230b-40: aam h'um tr'am aam kham zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dgod do //
T02D2590:230b-41: de nas spyi bor gnas pa'i aom las byung ba'i
T02D2590:230b-42: sku rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i bde bas rnam
T02D2590:230b-44: lus thams cad nas yang dag par spros te //
T02D2590:230b-45: mdun du phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2590:230b-46: pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba sras dang
T02D2590:230b-47: bcas par rnam par bsams la /
T02D2590:230b-49: de'i phyag gi zhags pas drangs la rang gi lus la bcug stem /
T02D2590:230b-50: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhu bar gyur pa dang /
T02D2590:230b-51: de'i bdag nyid can du rang gi lus la sku
T02D2590:230b-52: rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par bsams la
T02D2590:230b-54: aom dzi na dzika aa dhi ti shtha sva m'am /
T02D2590:230b-55: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyid bsgreng ste /
T02D2590:230b-56: spyi bor gzhag pa ni sku byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2590:230b-57: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad zhugs nas byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2590:231a-0: mtshan dang dpe byed kyis bdag nyid rnam par brgyan par lhag par mos par @231a * //
T02D2590:231a-2: / de bzhin du lkog mar gnas pa'i yi ge
T02D2590:231a-3: a'a: las byung ba'i gsung gi rdo rje bsams la
T02D2590:231a-4: / gos dkar mo yang dag par spros te snga
T02D2590:231a-5: ma bzhin du de zhugs pas rang gi lce gsung
T02D2590:231a-6: rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlab par
T02D2590:231a-7: / bya'o // aom a'a ro li ka aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D2590:231a-8: de nyid las g-yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste /
T02D2590:231a-9: g-yas pa bsgreng ba ni gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2590:231a-10: de nas zla ba kha ma pa lta bu chos
T02D2590:231a-11: thams cad kyi gnas su gyur par dbyangs kyi yan
T02D2590:231a-12: lag rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi ngo bo
T02D2590:231a-13: nyid kyi lce mos par bya'o //
T02D2590:231a-14: de bzhin du snying gar gnas pa'i yi ga h'um
T02D2590:231a-15: las byung ba'i thugs rdo rjer bsams la de bzhin
T02D2590:231a-16: du m'a ma ka'i spro ba sngon du 'gro bas
T02D2590:231a-17: bcug la / rang gi sems thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2590:231a-18: aom badzra dhrika aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D2590:231a-19: de nyid la mthe bo g-yas pa nang du bcug la /
T02D2590:231a-20: g-yon pa bsgred [*bsgreng?] ba ni thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2590:231a-21: de nas h'um las byung ba'i snying gi padma'i zla
T02D2590:231a-22: ba chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa dang bcas
T02D2590:231a-23: pa'i 'od kyi phred ba kun du 'phro bar bsam
T02D2590:231a-24: par bya'o // de nas sa ma yo&amp ;
T02D2590:231a-26: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snga ma bzhin
T02D2590:231a-27: bu snying ga la sogs par rdo rje la sogs
T02D2590:231a-28: pa bsams te / de dang sa ma ya sa
T02D2590:231a-29: tva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya ba dang
T02D2590:231a-30: byin gyis brlabs la rang gi sngags brjod nas sku
T02D2590:231a-31: dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes kyang 'jam pa'i rdo
T02D2590:231a-32: rjer bdag nyid bsgom par bya zhing /
T02D2590:231a-33: manydzu badzro& ham zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bya'o ;
T02D2590:231a-34: / de nas de bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos gnas la /
T02D2590:231a-35: sa ma ya aa: zhes brjod de /
T02D2590:231a-36: mdun du pam las byung ba'i padma dang zla ba'i
T02D2590:231a-37: dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i aom mu: aa: zhes bya
T02D2590:231a-38: ba las autpala rnam par bsams la /
T02D2590:231a-39: chos bdag med pa'i dam tshig gi nang du zhugs te //
T02D2590:231a-40: manydzu badzro& ham zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2590:231a-41: 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2590:231a-42: de nas de'i 'og tu sngags dang phyag rgya 'di
T02D2590:231a-43: rnams kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug cing bcug la
T02D2590:231a-45: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo lcags kyu bcid ba ni /
T02D2590:231b-0: mthe @231b chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02D2590:231b-1: mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub //
T02D2590:231b-2: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02D2590:231b-4: aom badzra aam gu sha dza: h'um /
T02D2590:231b-5: aom badzra p'a sha h'um h'um /
T02D2590:231b-6: aom badzra spho ta h'um bam /
T02D2590:231b-7: aom badzra a'a we sha h'um ho: zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
T02D2590:231b-8: aom ai mra ta kunta li bibhna nta ka h'um /
T02D2590:231b-9: 'di'i phyag rgya ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sku bsams la /
T02D2590:231b-10: lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo'i rtse mo gsum pa lta bur brkyang la /
T02D2590:231b-11: dpung pa'i rtsar khros pas bzhag na /
T02D2590:231b-12: mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2590:231b-13: de bzhin du phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa yang bya ste /
T02D2590:231b-14: spe la ba'i sbyor bas phyogs bcing ba dang /
T02D2590:231b-15: ra ba dang dra ba la sogs kyang bya ste /
T02D2590:231b-16: spel ba'i sbyor bas phyogs bcing ba dang /
T02D2590:231b-17: ra ba dang dra ba la sogs pa yang bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:231b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das la pa las byung ba'i padma'i gdan /
T02D2590:231b-19: aom ka ma la h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bstabs la /
T02D2590:231b-20: thal mo kha phye ba dang /
T02D2590:231b-21: rang gi sngags kyis mchod yon phul te /
T02D2590:231b-22: aom pra ba ra satk'a ram pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags dang /
T02D2590:231b-23: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bo dang /
T02D2590:231b-24: mdzub mo sbyar bas me tog blangs la zhabs ba sil dbul te /
T02D2590:231b-25: sor mo lhag ma rnams zlum po'i rnam pas brkyang
T02D2590:231b-26: bas phyag rgyas kyang zhabs bsil phul la dam tshig
T02D2590:231b-27: bstan par bya'o // de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te /
T02D2590:231b-28: thal mo khong stong du sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas /
T02D2590:231b-29: autpa la kha phye ba lta bur bzhag la /
T02D2590:231b-30: mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la bskul bar bya zhing 'di bcings la /
T02D2590:231b-31: rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o //
T02D2590:231b-32: aom mu dri shya ho: zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:231b-33: yang dag par bskul la de nyid la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de /
T02D2590:231b-34: rang gi lus la bcom ldan 'das dgug pa dang /
T02D2590:231b-37: dbang du bya ba byas la sam ya stvam zhes brjod de /
T02D2590:231b-38: rgyab tu zla ba bsams la dza: h'um bam ho: sam ya stvam /
T02D2590:231b-39: aom mu: zhes lan gsum brjod de ye shes sems dpa' dang /
T02D2590:231b-40: lhan cig gcig tu bsgoms la /
T02D2590:231b-41: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2590:232a-0: de nas phyag rgya chen pos gnas @232a * //
T02D2590:232a-1: la lha thams cad kyi gnas su ma ya aa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:232a-2: ci rigs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2590:232a-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi lus la rnam par bkod la /
T02D2590:232a-4: rang gi snying pos spyi gtsug gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad /
T02D2590:232a-7: lkog mar 'od dpag tu med pa /
T02D2590:232a-8: spyi bor don yod grub pa /
T02D2590:232a-10: mi bskyod pa'i g-yon logs su m'a ma k'i /
T02D2590:232a-11: 'od dpag tu med pa'i g-yon logs su gos dkar mo /
T02D2590:232a-12: don yod par grub pa'i g-yon logs su sgrol ma ;
T02D2590:232a-13: mi bskyod pa la g-yas logs su rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D2590:232a-14: mi bskyod pa'i rgyab tu skul byed ma /
T02D2590:232a-15: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi g-yon logs su rin chen sgrol ma /
T02D2590:232a-16: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rgyab tu khro gnyer can /
T02D2590:232a-17: don yod par grub pa'i rgyab tu rdo rje lu gu rgyud /
T02D2590:232a-19: smin mtshams su gzhan gyis mi thub pa /
T02D2590:232a-21: gsang bar bdud rtsi thab spyor /
T02D2590:232a-22: dpral pa'i steng du 'phags pa mi g-yo ba /
T02D2590:232a-23: mi bskyod pa'i mdun du 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2590:232a-24: dpung pa gnyis la dbyig sngon /
T02D2590:232a-25: rkang pa gnyis la stobs po che ;
T02D2590:232a-26: rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du gnod mdzes rgyal po /
T02D2590:232a-27: rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og
T02D2590:232a-28: / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad la byams pa
T02D2590:232a-29: la sogs / spyi gtsug gi stang du 'khor los sgyur ba /
T02D2590:232a-30: brum las byung ba rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa padma dang /
T02D2590:232a-31: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2590:232a-34: phyag la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba /
T02D2590:232a-35: 'od zer lnga pa'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /
T02D2590:232a-36: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i phreng ba can /
T02D2590:232a-37: rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba /
T02D2590:232a-38: spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rin po che dang /
T02D2590:232a-41: autpa la rin po che bzhin du bsnams pa /
T02D2590:232a-42: gnyis gnyis kyis logs gnyis su mdzes par byas par rang gi snying po nyid kyis bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:232a-43: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02D2590:232a-44: lag ngar gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bsnol te /
T02D2590:232b-0: @232b mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas la /
T02D2590:232b-2: gung mo gnyis kyis se gol brdebs shing dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod la /
T02D2590:232b-3: rang gi lus la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D2590:232b-4: par yid kyis rnam par bsams pa legs so zhes
T02D2590:232b-5: bya ba'i sbyor bas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D2590:232b-7: bcings la dbang du byas nas aom a'a: h'um zhes
T02D2590:232b-8: bya ba'i yi ge gsum rnams par bkod pa sngon
T02D2590:232b-9: du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du rang gi phyag
T02D2590:232b-11: yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o //
T02D2590:232b-12: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D2590:232b-14: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2590:232b-15: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D2590:232b-16: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2590:232b-17: su po shyo me bha pa /
T02D2590:232b-19: sarbba karmma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D2590:232b-20: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga w'ana sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02D2590:232b-21: badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a:/
T02D2590:232b-24: spyi bo rnams su rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2590:232b-25: rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis sbyar la /
T02D2590:232b-26: aom satva badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am h'um /
T02D2590:232b-27: de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dbus ma bcag pa ni rin po che ste /
T02D2590:232b-28: aom ratna badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am h'um /
T02D2590:232b-29: de nyid las gung mo padma'i 'dab ma ltar bya'o //
T02D2590:232b-30: aom dha rmma badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am h'um /
T02D2590:232b-31: de nyid las gung mo sbyar ba'i rtse mo bcag pa ni ral gri'o //
T02D2590:232b-32: aom karmma badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am h'um /
T02D2590:232b-33: gnas 'di dag tu rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang /
T02D2590:232b-34: ral gri nang du chud pa'i rdo rje sems ma
T02D2590:232b-35: la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams byin gyis brlab par
T02D2590:232b-36: bsam par bya'o // de nas yang dbang bskur ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2590:232b-37: rdo rje can gyis 'gro bskyab phyir //
T02D2590:232b-38: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ba //
T02D2590:232b-39: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar stsal //
T02D2590:232b-40: de bzhin ded ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2590:232b-41: de nas nam mkha'i khongs thams cad til gyi gang
T02D2590:232b-42: bu bzhin du kun du gang ba'i rig pa'i lha
T02D2590:232b-43: mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
T02D2590:232b-44: kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa thogs shing mchod
T02D2590:232b-45: pa'i yo byad dang ldan pa rnams byon nas mi
T02D2590:232b-46: bskyod pa'i cod pa na gyi sbyor bas rtse bran
T02D2590:233a-1: zhing 'di skad du gsung bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:233a-2: dbang bskur ba yi rdo rje che //
T02D2590:233a-3: khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa //
T02D2590:233a-4: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02D2590:233a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D2590:233a-6: de nas dbang bskur ba de phyag rgya 'di dag gis brtan par bya'o //
T02D2590:233a-8: mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02D2590:233a-9: mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug pas ni //
T02D2590:233a-10: gung mo mnyam pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02D2590:233a-11: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02D2590:233a-12: sngags ni aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um /
T02D2590:233a-13: badzri ni aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2590:233a-14: de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya //
T02D2590:233a-16: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya //
T02D2590:233a-18: padma srin lag mthe'u chung gung /
T02D2590:233a-20: lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang //
T02D2590:233a-22: aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2590:233a-23: phyag rgya 'di dag kyang spyi bo dang /
T02D2590:233a-25: rna ba g-yas pa'i ltag dang mgo'i rgyab dang /
T02D2590:233a-26: rna ba g-yon pa'i ltag gi gnas rnams su rim pa bzhin du sbyar te /
T02D2590:233a-27: dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po
T02D2590:233a-28: bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub kyi sems dam
T02D2590:233a-29: pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das
T02D2590:233a-30: mi bskyod pa nyid cod pan du bsam par bya'o
T02D2590:233a-31: ; / la la ni rdo rje sems ma la
T02D2590:233a-32: sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis dbang bskur
T02D2590:233a-33: ; bar 'dod do // de nas rdo rje khu
T02D2590:233a-34: tshur gnyis mdun du mdud pa lta bus bcing bar
T02D2590:233a-35: bya zhing rgyab tu yang de bzhin du mdud la
T02D2590:233a-36: ; bar 'dod do // / bsgyings pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa nas dgrol bas /
T02D2590:233a-37: rna ba gnyis kyi dar dbyangs 'phyang ba byas la /
T02D2590:233a-38: mthar thal mo mnyam pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2590:233a-40: yang cod pan gyi steng du kam ham kam zhes bya ba bkod la /
T02D2590:233a-41: aom tum zhes bya bas go bgos te /
T02D2590:233a-42: rdo rje kha tshur snying gar mdud pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la /
T02D2590:233a-44: yang de bzhin du snying gar ro //
T02D2590:233a-45: de nas nu ma'i bar dang yang snying gar ro //
T02D2590:233a-48: mgo bor de bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba
T02D2590:233a-49: bcings pa'i mdud pa'i sbyor ba mtha' ma la sogs
T02D2590:233a-50: pa sor mo thams cad bkrol la /
T02D2590:233b-0: dar dpyangs @233b kyi tshul du byas la mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2590:233b-1: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid
T02D2590:233b-2: snying ga la sogs par bkrol bas rang gi snying
T02D2590:233b-3: po ni snying gar dgod par bya'o //
T02D2590:233b-4: nye ba'i snying po la sogs par bsam pas ni snying ga'i gong du'o //
T02D2590:233b-5: spyi bor bsam pas ni mgo bor ro //
T02D2590:233b-6: spyi gtsug la sogs par bsam pas ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
T02D2590:233b-7: go cha la sogs par bsam pas ni nu ma'i bar du'o //
T02D2590:233b-8: mtshon cha la sogs par bsam pas ni lag pa g-yas par ro //
T02D2590:233b-9: nye ba'i snying po la sogs par bsam pas ni lag pa g-yon du'o //
T02D2590:233b-10: lcags mda' la sogs par bsam pas ni phrag pa g-yas su'o //
T02D2590:233b-11: mda'i dra ba la sogs par bsam pas ni phrag pa g-yon du'o //
T02D2590:233b-12: mtshon cha thams cad du bsam pas ni lus thams cad du dgod par bya'o //
T02D2590:233b-13: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de ;
T02D2590:233b-14: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2590:233b-15: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2590:233b-16: mi gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2590:233b-17: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs rnams de'i sngags nyid kyis blang bar bya ste /
T02D2590:233b-18: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag gi slob dpon du gyur nas /
T02D2590:233b-19: thams cad mdzad do zhes lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D2590:233b-20: sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas /
T02D2590:233b-21: deng khyod bdag ni bskur bar 'gyur //
T02D2590:233b-22: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D2590:233b-23: rab tu grub phyir rdo rje long //
T02D2590:233b-24: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02D2590:233b-26: tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2590:233b-27: de nas rdo rje dril bu dang bcas par spyi bor bzhag la /
T02D2590:233b-28: ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur te /
T02D2590:233b-31: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02D2590:233b-32: kye dpal mchog sbyin rdo rje zhes bya ba /
T02D2590:233b-33: de nas rdo rje'i brtul zhugs ni //
T02D2590:233b-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D2590:233b-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na gnas /
T02D2590:233b-36: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad //
T02D2590:233b-37: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D2590:233b-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sam ya tishtha ae sha stvam /
T02D2590:233b-39: dha ra mi badzra satva hi hi hi hi hi h'um zhes bya ba'i glu blang bar bya'o //
T02D2590:233b-40: de'i 'og tu dam tshig gsum sbyin pa bya ste /
T02D2590:234a-0: h'um las rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo de bzhin @234a * //
T02D2590:234a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rnam par bsams la /
T02D2590:234a-2: de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2590:234a-3: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2590:234a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2590:234a-5: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2590:234a-6: rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag / dang po'i mchog gi skyes bu ni //
T02D2590:234a-7: bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyis ni rdo rje'o //
T02D2590:234a-8: 'di ni sangs rgyas de kun gyi //
T02D2590:234a-9: shes rab sgra yis rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D2590:234a-10: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2590:234a-11: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02D2590:234a-13: aa:'i sa bon las byung ba 'dril bu de bzhin
T02D2590:234a-14: gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs kyi bdag nyid
T02D2590:234a-15: can / shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dril bu yang dag par blangs la /
T02D2590:234a-16: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas //
T02D2590:234a-17: ngo bo nyid dag sems dpa' mchog / srid pa mchog ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D2590:234a-20: de nas srid pa yongs su dag pa'i thabs rtog
T02D2590:234a-21: pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po rtag tu
T02D2590:234a-23: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D2590:234a-24: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02D2590:234a-25: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2590:234a-26: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu srungs //
T02D2590:234a-27: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02D2590:234a-28: ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du //
T02D2590:234a-29: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2590:234a-30: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2590:234a-31: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02D2590:234a-32: mkhas mchog 'dug bar gyur pa'i tshe //
T02D2590:234a-33: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D2590:234a-34: mya ngan mi mnga' byed par nus //
T02D2590:234a-35: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs //
T02D2590:234a-36: bsod nams byin rlabs kyis bsgrubs pa //
T02D2590:234a-37: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
T02D2590:234a-38: sems can don rnams brtan par byed //
T02D2590:234a-39: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
T02D2590:234a-40: phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02D2590:234a-41: gang gis gzugs kun brtan gyur pa //
T02D2590:234a-42: des na phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags //
T02D2590:234a-44: dam tshig gis sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i bdag
T02D2590:234a-45: nyid can gyi phyag rgyar byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D2590:234b-0: // de nas @234b dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ste /
T02D2590:234b-1: aom man mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D2590:234b-2: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D2590:234b-3: rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2590:234b-4: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02D2590:234b-5: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha ;
T02D2590:234b-6: ; rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2590:234b-7: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2590:234b-8: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod //
T02D2590:234b-9: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes su brnyes //
T02D2590:234b-10: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02D2590:234b-11: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02D2590:234b-12: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2590:234b-13: kun du bzang po'i kun bdag nyid //
T02D2590:234b-14: byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2590:234b-15: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis //
T02D2590:234b-16: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas //
T02D2590:234b-17: rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig / de nas
T02D2590:234b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la
T02D2590:234b-19: / aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D2590:234b-20: aom sarbba sa mo& ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:234b-22: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje autpa la'i dbus su rang gi sngags rnam par bsams la /
T02D2590:234b-23: de nyid yid la zlos shing ba sam par bya'o //
T02D2590:234b-24: de nas de bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos gnas
T02D2590:234b-25: la g-yon pa'i mig tu ta las zla ba bya
T02D2590:234b-26: / g-yas par ma bkod nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ba skyed /
T02D2590:234b-27: h'um gis mig 'bras bskal pa'i me lta bu /
T02D2590:234b-28: yid kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas par bya'o //
T02D2590:234b-29: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'og tu yi ge h'um
T02D2590:234b-30: de las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga ba yi
T02D2590:234b-31: ge bam dbus su bkod pa rdo rje me'i 'od
T02D2590:234b-32: dang mnyam pas dus mtha'i rlung gis spar ba'i bskal
T02D2590:234b-33: ba sreg pa'i gzugs can lta bu'i rdo rje des
T02D2590:234b-34: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad thal bar byas par
T02D2590:234b-35: bsam par bya'o // de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su
T02D2590:234b-36: stong gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam
T02D2590:234b-37: gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge kham gnas
T02D2590:234b-38: pa de las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2590:234b-39: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas kun du 'khyud
T02D2590:234b-40: bsam par bya'o // pa byung bas // rdo rje
T02D2590:234b-41: bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis kun du bsreg pa'i sangs
T02D2590:235a-1: rlabs 'khrug pa'o ma'i rgya mtsho lta bur kun du bkang nas gnas so //
T02D2590:235a-2: de nas de'i dbus su yi ge ras rang gi 'od kyis 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bskol ba dang /
T02D2590:235a-3: padma chen po'i gzugs la padma mtha' yas pas yongs su bskor bar bsams nas /
T02D2590:235a-4: de'i lte bar gser gyi mdog can gyi ra ba bsams la /
T02D2590:235a-5: der yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha'i phyogs nas byon te bzhugs so //
T02D2590:235a-6: de nas h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2590:235a-7: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las ri'i rgyal
T02D2590:235a-8: po ri rab zur bzhi pa rin po che sna
T02D2590:235a-12: gser gyi ri bdun la sogs pas yongs su bskor bar bsams la /
T02D2590:235a-13: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarbam sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:235a-14: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ste /
T02D2590:235a-15: sa la bzhag pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2590:235a-16: de lta bu gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gnas rnam pa
T02D2590:235a-17: kun du rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D2590:235a-20: yi ge bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02D2590:235a-21: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2590:235a-22: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D2590:235a-23: dril bu dang ni ba dan sogs //
T02D2590:235a-24: sgo khyud kyis ni nye bar mdzes //
T02D2590:235a-25: grva dang mtshams rnams thams cad du ;
T02D2590:235a-26: / rdo rje rin chen dag gis spras //
T02D2590:235a-27: dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan //
T02D2590:235a-28: zla ba nyi ma sogs kyis brgyan //
T02D2590:235a-29: sna tshogs pa yi bla re bres //
T02D2590:235a-30: gos dang phreng ba sna tshogs ldan //
T02D2590:235a-31: mtshams su zla phyed rin chen mchog / rdo rje mdzes pas rnam par brgyan //
T02D2590:235a-32: thig bzhi yongs su btab pa dang //
T02D2590:235a-33: kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor //
T02D2590:235a-34: de yi dbus su 'khor lo gzhan //
T02D2590:235a-35: de bzhin de yi dbus su'ang gzhan //
T02D2590:235a-36: rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor cing //
T02D2590:235a-37: rdo rje ka ba brgyad kyis brgyan //
T02D2590:235a-38: rtsig pa rin chen sna lnga 'bar //
T02D2590:235a-39: ye shes kyis sprul gzhal yas khang //
T02D2590:235a-40: nam mkha'i grangs med ltar rgya che //
T02D2590:235a-42: kha ba can gyi ri ltar dkar //
T02D2590:235a-43: mchod rten chen po'i nang du chud //
T02D2590:235a-45: phyogs kyi tshogs rnams khyab gyur pa //
T02D2590:235a-46: yid kyi rang bzhin mchod chen 'di //
T02D2590:235b-0: khyad @235b par 'phags pa rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2590:235b-1: de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
T02D2590:235b-2: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang /
T02D2590:235b-3: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02D2590:235b-4: mig yor tsam gyi khang pa brtsegs ma rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D2590:235b-5: de'i dbus su yang h'um sam h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2590:235b-6: las seng ge'i gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan
T02D2590:235b-8: rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2590:235b-9: bzlas brjod byed par 'dod pas rang gi snying ga las bdag po rang gi sngags kyis bton la /
T02D2590:235b-12: mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2590:235b-13: zung du gnas pa'i sbyor ba'am /
T02D2590:235b-14: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas 'og nas bshad pa'i
T02D2590:235b-15: tshul gyis bzlas brjod dang gshegs su gsol ba la
T02D2590:235b-18: mdor bsdus pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D2590:235b-19: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyis spros pa dang /
T02D2590:235b-21: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan par //
T02D2590:235b-22: skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa /
T02D2590:235b-23: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bshad do //
T02D2590:235b-25: yang na rnal 'byor rgya chen po byed par 'dod na /
T02D2590:235b-26: de'i tshe lha thams cad kyi gnas su yang pam las sna tshogs padma'i gdan la /
T02D2590:235b-27: aa dang aam las zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ci rigs par rnam par bsams la /
T02D2590:235b-28: de bzhin du dbus ma'i seng ge'i gdan la dus
T02D2590:235b-29: yun ring po nas goms par byas pa'i thugs rje
T02D2590:235b-30: chen po mngon du bsgoms la /
T02D2590:235b-31: 'gro ba ma lus pa 'di dag thabs dang shes
T02D2590:235b-32: rab dang bral bas sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa la
T02D2590:235b-33: blta ste / thabs 'dis de rnams kyi don bya'o zhes bsams la /
T02D2590:235b-34: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha
T02D2590:235b-35: rol du phyin pa dri ma med pa ji srid
T02D2590:235b-37: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nu t'a ga
T02D2590:235b-38: na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham zhes
T02D2590:235b-39: bya bas rjes su mnyes par byas la /
T02D2590:235b-40: aom badzra ko sha gu hya h'um zhes bya bas bskul ba dang /
T02D2590:235b-41: byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed pa de nyid
T02D2590:235b-42: kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed par dga'
T02D2590:236a-1: thob par bdag nyid shes nas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa dang /
T02D2590:236a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par gang
T02D2590:236a-4: ba'i rang gi byang chub kyi sems shes rab kyi
T02D2590:236a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid du zhu bar
T02D2590:236a-6: gyur cing / nang du chud par byas la /
T02D2590:236a-8: yi ge aom las byung ba bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2590:236a-9: par snang mdzad rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
T02D2590:236a-10: pa // zhi ba ral pa dang thor tshugs 'chang ba //
T02D2590:236a-11: rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa //
T02D2590:236a-16: sku mdog ser po phyag drug pa /
T02D2590:236a-17: phyag dang po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa //
T02D2590:236a-18: g-yas na bgrang phreng dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02D2590:236a-19: g-yon gyis lha mo'i nu ma dang /
T02D2590:236a-21: lha rnams 'jigs shing skrag par mdzad pas zhabs kyi padma la phyag 'tshal ba /
T02D2590:236a-22: sangs rgyas kyi sprin chen po 'phro ba /
T02D2590:236a-23: aom a'a: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par spros la /
T02D2590:236a-24: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ma lus par khyab ste /
T02D2590:236a-25: 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad nas //
T02D2590:236a-26: sngags 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid la gzhug pa dang brtan par bya'o //
T02D2590:236a-27: h'um las mi bskyod pa sku mdog aindra n'i la'i 'od dang mnyam pa /
T02D2590:236a-29: spyan gsum pa cung zad bzhad cing sgeg pa /
T02D2590:236a-32: zhal dbus ma sku dang 'dra ba /
T02D2590:236a-33: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2590:236a-34: phyag brgyad pa g-yas kyis ba dan gsum pa'i gung
T02D2590:236a-35: mo'i dbus su rdo rje thugs kar 'degs par brtson
T02D2590:236a-36: pa / g-yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten pas dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D2590:236a-37: yang g-yas na ral gri dang /
T02D2590:236a-40: g-yon na lha mo'i nu ma dang /
T02D2590:236a-43: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par gyur pa'i mi
T02D2590:236a-44: bskyod pa'i cod pan can rol pa'i stang stabs kyis
T02D2590:236a-46: aom h'um: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis spros la /
T02D2590:236a-47: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba'i don byas nas slar byon te /
T02D2590:236b-0: rang gi sngags nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi re'u cha @236b la dgod par bya zhing brtan par bya'o //
T02D2590:236b-1: de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba /
T02D2590:236b-2: rang rang gi sngags kyis yang dag par spros te /
T02D2590:236b-3: rang rang gi sngags nyid kyis rang rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya zhing brtan par bya'o //
T02D2590:236b-4: zhal gsum gyi dbus ma ni sku dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o //
T02D2590:236b-5: tam las rin chen 'byung ldan spyan gsum pa /
T02D2590:236b-6: rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2590:236b-7: sku mdog dmar po zhal g-yas sngo /
T02D2590:236b-8: g-yon dkar ba phyag dang po gnyis kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D2590:236b-9: g-yas na rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D2590:236b-10: g-yon na rin po che bsnams pa /
T02D2590:236b-11: snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs kyi re'u cha la dgod do //
T02D2590:236b-12: a'a: las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa 'jig rten dbang phyug sku rnam par byung ba /
T02D2590:236b-13: ral pa dang thor tshugs 'chang ba /
T02D2590:236b-14: zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pas dbu rgyan byas pa /
T02D2590:236b-16: ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog can /
T02D2590:236b-19: phyag g-yon pas padma'i rtsa ba bzung nas dkur brten pa //
T02D2590:236b-20: g-yas pas rang gi thugs kar padma rnam par 'byed pa /
T02D2590:236b-21: yang g-yas gnyis na bgrang phreng dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D2590:236b-22: g-yon gnyis na nu ma dang /
T02D2590:236b-23: ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa /
T02D2590:236b-25: gdan gcig pa nub kya re'u cha la'o //
T02D2590:236b-26: kham las byung ba'i don yong grub pa marka ta gyi mdog can /
T02D2590:236b-29: phyag dang po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcas pa /
T02D2590:236b-30: yang g-yas dang g-yon gnyis kyis ral gri dang /
T02D2590:236b-32: rin po che'i cod pan can byar du'o //
T02D2590:236b-33: 'di dag ni sems dpa'i skyil mo klung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2590:236b-34: aom tr'am aom hr'i: aom kham zhes bya bas ni rim bzhin du 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no //
T02D2590:236b-37: kham tsum ram phrim h'um zhes bya bas sa bon
T02D2590:236b-38: gyi yi ge 'di rnams las spyan la sogs pa'i
T02D2590:236b-39: lha mo'i 'khor lo rnams rim bzhin du bskyed la
T02D2590:236b-40: / gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod par bya'o //
T02D2590:236b-41: de la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su lha mo spyan sku mdog ser ba /
T02D2590:236b-42: phyag g-yas na mchog sbyin dang /
T02D2590:237a-1: mdzub dang ldan pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02D2590:237a-2: rin po che'i snye ma dang //
T02D2590:237a-5: me'i phyogs su m'a ma k'i autpa la sngon po'i
T02D2590:237a-6: mdog can khro ba dang bcas pa bzhad pa'i zhal
T02D2590:237a-7: dang ldan pa // phyag g-yas mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2590:237a-8: rdo rje dang mda' bsams pa'o //
T02D2590:237a-12: bden bral gyi phyogs su gos dkar can /
T02D2590:237a-13: zla ba'i mdog can g-yas na mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mdas brgyan pa /
T02D2590:237a-15: bgrang phreng dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D2590:237a-16: rol pa'i stang stabs can no //
T02D2590:237a-17: rlung gi phyogs su sgrol ma marka ta kyi mdog
T02D2590:237a-18: can g-yas na mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang
T02D2590:237a-19: mda' bsnams pa / g-yon na sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D2590:237a-22: gsum po 'di dag ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung can no //
T02D2590:237a-23: dkyil 'khor gnyis par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02D2590:237a-26: las kyi sems ma rim bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang //
T02D2590:237a-27: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa 'dra ba yin mod kyi //
T02D2590:237a-28: gzhan du na g-yon pa'i gnyis pas nu ma bsnams pa med pa'i phyir //
T02D2590:237a-29: ci rigs par sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa'i zhags pa bsnams par shes par bya'o //
T02D2590:237a-30: byang shar mtshams su lha mo skul byed ma /
T02D2590:237a-31: zla ba'i mdog can phyag dang po gnyis kyi sa
T02D2590:237a-32: 'og nas bshad pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings pas
T02D2590:237a-33: / thugs ka'i gnas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D2590:237a-34: g-yas rnams na mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2590:237a-44: ba dan gsum pa'i tshul dang /
T02D2590:237a-46: g-yon rnams na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2590:237b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu @237b phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
T02D2590:237b-1: shin tu dang ba'i dar la'i zheng chung du'i stong g-yogs legs par bgos pa /
T02D2590:237b-2: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2590:237b-3: dar la bab cing skal ba bzang ba /
T02D2590:237b-12: zhi ba zhes bya ba'i nyams dgu dang ldan pas spyi bo dang /
T02D2590:237b-20: zhabs rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang //
T02D2590:237b-23: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02D2590:237b-28: rdo rje sen mo can gyis gnas su byas pa /
T02D2590:237b-29: 'di'i zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa /
T02D2590:237b-30: sku'i mdog can zhal g-yas pa gdengs pa /
T02D2590:237b-31: autpa la sngon po'i mdog can /
T02D2590:237b-32: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D2590:237b-34: zhal g-yon pa ser po tshem kyis sgros gnon pa'o //
T02D2590:237b-35: shar lho mtshams su rin chen sgrol ma sku mdog ser po //
T02D2590:237b-36: phyag dang po gnyis kyis thugs kar rin po che'i thal mo sbyar te 'jog pa /
T02D2590:237b-37: yang g-yas kyi gnyis pas mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2590:237b-39: g-yon gyi gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D2590:237b-42: lho nub mtshams su khro gnyer can zla ba'i mdog can g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02D2590:237b-48: nub byang mtshams su rdo rje lu gu rgyud sku mdog ljang gu //
T02D2590:237b-49: g-yas na rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02D2590:237b-55: gdug pa thams cad nges par 'dul ba ste /
T02D2590:237b-56: 'di dag ni rol ba'i stang stabs dang ldan pa yin no //
T02D2590:237b-57: spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di dag thams cad ni zla ba'i gdan dang /
T02D2590:238a-1: 'khor dmar po dang spyan gsum dang rang gi phyogs kyi bdag po dang 'dra ba'i zhal gsum dang /
T02D2590:238a-2: rang gi bdag po rin po che'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02D2590:238a-3: gos dang rgyan tshogs pa mnga' ba yin no //
T02D2590:238a-4: aom ga ga na lo tsa ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238a-5: aom ri ri ri ri m'a ma k'i h'um /
T02D2590:238a-6: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka tam ka te ka ro ta bidye sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238a-7: aom t'a te du tt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238a-12: aom tsa le tsu le tsunda sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238a-13: aom ratnol ke ratna dzva li ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238a-15: aom badzra shrim kha le h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238a-16: 'di dag ni ci rigs par 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no //
T02D2590:238a-17: de nas dkyil 'khor gsum par rim pa bzhin du
T02D2590:238a-18: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su byams pa la
T02D2590:238a-19: sogs pa rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba
T02D2590:238a-20: dgod par bya'o // de la shar phyogs su yi
T02D2590:238a-21: ge meem las byung ba'i byams pa gser gyi mdog
T02D2590:238a-23: phyag dang po gnyis kyis chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgyar byas pa //
T02D2590:238a-25: g-yon gyis me tog dang bcas pa'i n'a ga ge sar gyi snye ma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2590:238a-26: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni sngar ji skad bstan pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D2590:238a-27: gam las byung ba'i spos kyi glang po ni mdog ljang gu g-yon na bum pa bsnams pa /
T02D2590:238a-28: g-yas kyis glang po che'i mchu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2590:238a-29: dzam las byung ba'i ye shes tog sku mdog ser
T02D2590:238a-30: po g-yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan
T02D2590:238a-33: aom gandha ha sti ne h'um //
T02D2590:238a-34: aom dzny'a na ke tu dzny'a na ba ti aom /
T02D2590:238a-35: 'di dag ni rim pa bzhin du 'di rnams kyi spro ba la sogs pa'i sngags yin no //
T02D2590:238a-36: yang lho phyogs su bha las byung ba'i bzang skyong sku mdog dmar po phyag thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D2590:238a-37: sa las byung ba'i rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyang /
T02D2590:238a-38: dung dang kunda ltar dkar ba /
T02D2590:238a-39: phyag gnyis brkyang ba'i sor mo thams cad kyis rlabs ltar mdzad pa'o ;
T02D2590:238a-40: / aa las byung ba'i blo gros mi zad pa ni gser gyi mdog can khu tshur yod pa /
T02D2590:238a-41: thugs kar 'jog pa g-yas pas mchog sbyin no //
T02D2590:238a-42: pra las byung ba'i spobs pa brtsegs pa ni sku
T02D2590:238a-43: mdog ljang gu g-yon gyi khu tshur pang par 'jog
T02D2590:238a-44: pa / g-yas kyi khu tshur se gol brdebs pa'o//
T02D2590:238b-0: @238b aom bha dra ba ti bha dra b'a le sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238b-1: aom sva ga re ma h'a s'a ga re h'um /
T02D2590:238b-3: aaksha ya karma aa ba ra na bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238b-4: aom pra ti bh'a ne pra te bh'a na k'u te h'um /
T02D2590:238b-5: 'di dag ni rim bzhin du 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no //
T02D2590:238b-6: nub phyogs su ma las byung ba'i mthu chen thob
T02D2590:238b-7: sku mdog dkar po g-yon pas padma cung zad kha
T02D2590:238b-9: sa las byung ba'i ngan song kun 'dren sku mdog
T02D2590:238b-10: dkar po phyag gnyis sdig pa 'thor ba ltar mdzad
T02D2590:238b-11: pa'o // sa nyid las byung ba'i mya ngan dang
T02D2590:238b-12: mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros
T02D2590:238b-14: phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'phyar ba'i tshul mdzad pa'o //
T02D2590:238b-15: dza las byung ba'i dra ba can gyi 'od sku mdog dkar po //
T02D2590:238b-16: g-yon na autpa la la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02D2590:238b-17: aom sth'a me stha' me ma h'a sth'a me ba ti sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238b-18: aom sarbba a'a b'a y'a dza he sarbba aa ba
T02D2590:238b-19: dza ye sarbba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni
T02D2590:238b-20: h'um / aom aom sarbba sho ka ta mo nir gha te na ma ti h'um /
T02D2590:238b-21: aom dza li ni ma h'a dza li ni h'um zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gi sngags so //
T02D2590:238b-22: byang phyogs su tsa las byung ba'i zla ba'i 'od /
T02D2590:238b-23: zla ba'i mdog can autpa la la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02D2590:238b-24: aa las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa sku
T02D2590:238b-25: mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i bum
T02D2590:238b-26: pa bsnams pa'o / ga las byung ba'i nam mkha' mdzod gser gyi mdog can //
T02D2590:238b-28: g-yon gyi rdo rje'i khu tshur bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis rked par 'jog pa /
T02D2590:238b-29: g-yas pa nam mkhar yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2590:238b-30: skam las byung ba'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sku mdog sngon po'am dkar po /
T02D2590:238b-32: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe bong dang /
T02D2590:238b-33: mdzub mo sbyar nas 'dri ba'i tshul du 'jog pa'o //
T02D2590:238b-34: aom tsandra su tsandra bya ba lo ki te sv'a h'a /
T02D2590:238b-35: aom aa mri ta pra bhe aa mi ta ba ti h'um /
T02D2590:238b-36: aom ga ga na pa ra lo tsa ne h'um /
T02D2590:238b-37: aom sarbba ni ba ra na biskam bi ni h'um
T02D2590:238b-38: zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams kyi spro ba la
T02D2590:238b-40: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad kyang padma'i
T02D2590:238b-41: gdan can zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba sems dpa'i skyil
T02D2590:239a-1: gsum pa zhal gsum pa ring gi phyogs kyi bdag
T02D2590:239a-2: po dang 'dra ba mnga' zhing de'i cod pan can
T02D2590:239a-3: // rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs 'chang ba //
T02D2590:239a-4: phyag dang po gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag
T02D2590:239a-5: rgya bcings pa khyad par gyi tshig tu smos pa
T02D2590:239a-6: ma gtogs pa g-yas na mchog sbyin dang mda' dang
T02D2590:239a-8: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyi ngos gnyis gnyis
T02D2590:239a-9: kyi snam bul gnyis gnyis bdag po la mngon par
T02D2590:239a-10: phyogs nas bzhugs par rim pa bzhin bsam par bya'o
T02D2590:239a-11: // de nas h'um las 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dus mtha'i sprin lta bu /
T02D2590:239a-12: phyag g-yas na ral gri dang /
T02D2590:239a-15: g-yon na sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba /
T02D2590:239a-16: zhags pa dang bcas pas bsdigs par mdzad pa /
T02D2590:239a-17: g-yon gyi gnyis pas padma dkar po thogs pa'i lha
T02D2590:239a-18: mos g-yas kyis 'khyud pa la brtson pa'i zla ba'i
T02D2590:239a-19: mdog can gyi nu ma 'dzin pa /
T02D2590:239a-20: gsum pa ni gzhu bdungs pa bsnams pa /
T02D2590:239a-21: g-yas logs su lha mo marka ta ltar ljang ba /
T02D2590:239a-22: lag pa g-yas na autpa la sngon po thogs shing /
T02D2590:239a-23: lag pa g-yon pas mgul nas 'khyud pas nye bar mdzes pa byas pa /
T02D2590:239a-27: zhal dang po ha ha zhes rnam par bzhad pa /
T02D2590:239a-30: bzhi pa mi bzad pa chen po //
T02D2590:239a-31: lnga pa rdo rje mche ba can //
T02D2590:239a-32: drug pa ljags rnam par bskyod pa /
T02D2590:239a-33: spyan dmar pa khro bo'i lta ba 'jigs su rung ba /
T02D2590:239a-34: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis yang dag par brgyan pa /
T02D2590:239a-35: lha dang bgegs 'jigs pas kun du khyab par du
T02D2590:239a-36: ma 'og na gnas shing 'dud par byed pa rol
T02D2590:239a-37: pa'i sta bstabs kyis ma he'i steng na bzhugs pa
T02D2590:239a-38: snga ma bzhin du gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs
T02D2590:239a-40: kun du spros la yang dag par bsdus te ;
T02D2590:239a-41: rang gi sngags kyis rtsa ba'i shar sgor dgod par bya'o //
T02D2590:239a-42: de bzhin du lho'i sgor pra las byung ba'i gzhan
T02D2590:239a-43: gyis ma thub pa sku mdog ser po phyag g-yas
T02D2590:239a-45: dbyug pa dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02D2590:239a-46: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02D2590:239b-0: nu ma dang gzhu @239b bsnams pa /
T02D2590:239b-1: mi'u thung gi gzugs can no //
T02D2590:239b-2: nub kyi sgor ha las byung ba'i rta mgrin sku
T02D2590:239b-3: mdog dmar po phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang dbyug
T02D2590:239b-4: pa dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02D2590:239b-5: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02D2590:239b-8: byang gi sgor h'um las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor sngon po zhabs kyis bgegs rnams gnon pa /
T02D2590:239b-10: dgra sta dang mda' gsor ba bsnams pa /
T02D2590:239b-11: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02D2590:239b-12: nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2590:239b-13: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i mi g-yo ba sku mdog sngon po //
T02D2590:239b-14: mi g-yo ba byis pa'i gzugs can //
T02D2590:239b-15: gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa //
T02D2590:239b-19: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang //
T02D2590:239b-20: nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa //
T02D2590:239b-21: bung ba ltar gnag pa'i zur phud gcig g-yon du 'phyang ba mnga' ba //
T02D2590:239b-22: zhal g-yas pa'i ljags khrag gis brlan pa bsgril ba //
T02D2590:239b-23: rin po che'i ri'i steng na padma la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2590:239b-24: me'i phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po sku mdog sngon po ;
T02D2590:239b-25: / phyag dang po gnyis kyis rang gi dam tshig
T02D2590:239b-26: gi phyag rgya bcas pa yang g-yas gnyis na rdo
T02D2590:239b-28: g-yon gnyis na nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2590:239b-29: bden bral gyi phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i dbyug sngon can sku mdog sngon po //
T02D2590:239b-31: dbyug pa dang mda' bsnams pa //
T02D2590:239b-32: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02D2590:239b-33: nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2590:239b-34: rlung gi phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i stobs po che sku mdog sngon po //
T02D2590:239b-35: g-yas na rdo rje dang be con dang /
T02D2590:239b-36: ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa //
T02D2590:239b-37: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang //
T02D2590:239b-38: nu ma dang tho ba dang /
T02D2590:239b-40: steng du h'um las byung ba'i gnod mdzes rgyal po sku mdog sngon po /
T02D2590:239b-41: phyag dang po gnyis kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa /
T02D2590:239b-42: yang g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02D2590:240a-1: gnyis na nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D2590:240a-2: khams gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal bar mdzad pa'o /
T02D2590:240a-3: 'og tu h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje sa 'og char sprin sngon po lta bu //
T02D2590:240a-4: phyag g-yas rnams kyis rdo rje dang /
T02D2590:240a-5: lcags kyu dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02D2590:240a-6: g-yon sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02D2590:240a-7: nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D2590:240a-8: sa 'og na gnas pa'i lha ma yin ma lus pa'i tshogs rab tu 'joms par bsam par bya'o /
T02D2590:240a-9: khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa /
T02D2590:240a-11: khro bo'i lta ba 'jigs su rung ba //
T02D2590:240a-12: mtha' yas dang rigs ldan nag pos dbu skra bcings pa /
T02D2590:240a-13: 'jog po gser gyi mdog can gyis rna rgyan du byas pa /
T02D2590:240a-14: padma chen po gser btso ma'i kha dog can gyis gdu bur byas pa /
T02D2590:240a-15: karko ta kha dog dkar pos mchod phyir thogs su byas pa /
T02D2590:240a-16: nor rgyas kha dog dmar pos 'og pag byas pa /
T02D2590:240a-19: dkar bas zhabs gdub byas pa /
T02D2590:240a-20: 'di dag thams cad kyang gdengs ka 'jigs su rung ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2590:240a-21: na bza' stag gi pags pa bsnams pa /
T02D2590:240a-23: dbu spra 'khyil pa gyen du bsgreng pa bcings pa //
T02D2590:240a-24: mi bskyod pa'i chod pan can aag cho dmar ser can ;
T02D2590:240a-27: zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa //
T02D2590:240a-28: zhal g-yas pa rnam par gdangs pa //
T02D2590:240a-29: g-yon gyi tshems kyis sgros gnon pa dang /
T02D2590:240a-30: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa //
T02D2590:240a-32: rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs par shes par bya'o //
T02D2590:240a-36: aom aa mri ta kunda li bi ghn'anta ka h'um //
T02D2590:240a-38: aom ta kki h'um dza: aom n'i la danda ma h'a danda h'um /
T02D2590:240a-39: aom kro dha na h'um dza: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um /
T02D2590:240a-41: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D2590:240a-42: a'a na ya ho: bhag w'an bidya r'a dza h'um phat ;
T02D2590:240a-43: aom badzra p'a t'a la bhanydza bha nydza h'um zhes
T02D2590:240a-44: bya ba ni rim bzhin du 'di dag gi spro
T02D2590:240a-45: ba la sogs pa'i sngags yin no //
T02D2590:240a-46: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D2590:240a-47: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhi ni spyan
T02D2590:240a-48: la sogs pa'i rigs kyi yum gyi phyag rgyas so
T02D2590:240b-0: // spyan @240b la sogs pa ni rang gi phyag rgyas so //
T02D2590:240b-1: skul byed ma la sogs pa'i pho nya mo rnams ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D2590:240b-2: byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D2590:240b-3: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo rnams ni zhal gyi phag rgyas so //
T02D2590:240b-4: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'i bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyas spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2590:240b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa de rnams kyang 'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa //
T02D2590:240b-6: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas spyan drangs pa
T02D2590:240b-7: na 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams 'gyed par mdzad pas
T02D2590:240b-8: // sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas nyid la
T02D2590:240b-9: sogs pas dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad cing
T02D2590:240b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mngon par phyogs te /
T02D2590:240b-12: byon nas steng du bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:240b-13: de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2590:240b-14: nyid las g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur bya ba
T02D2590:240b-15: ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2590:240b-16: aom badzra aam ku sha / a'a karsha ya h'um dza: zhes bya ba ni sngags so //
T02D2590:240b-17: sbyan [*spyan] la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'og nas 'chad do //
T02D2590:240b-18: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya nyid do //
T02D2590:240b-19: thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste /
T02D2590:240b-20: gung mo gnyis gshibs pa'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo
T02D2590:240b-21: gnyis rdo rje lta bur gzhag pa ni rdo rje'i
T02D2590:240b-22: phyag rgya'o // h'um dza: zhes bya ba 'di dag thams cad kyi sngags so //
T02D2590:240b-23: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo
T02D2590:240b-24: gnyis zhags par bya ba ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2590:240b-25: // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis mche blta bur rnam par bzlog nas /
T02D2590:240b-26: mkhur ba gnyis su bzhag la //
T02D2590:240b-27: lce bskyod cing khro bo'i lta bas blta ba ni zhal gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2590:240b-28: la la ni 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya nyid zhal gyi phyag rgya nyid yin te /
T02D2590:240b-29: de ni kha dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T02D2590:240b-30: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi sngags yin no //
T02D2590:240b-31: de nas snga ma bzhin du shar sgor 'phags pa
T02D2590:240b-32: gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas rdo
T02D2590:241a-0: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni rang gi snying ga dang de las @241a * //
T02D2590:241a-1: gzhan pa nas rang rang gi rnam pa la'o //
T02D2590:241a-2: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i nga rgyal gyis lho sgor rdo rje zhags pas bcug la /
T02D2590:241a-3: 'phags pa rta mgrin gyi nga rgyal gyis nub sgo nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcings la /
T02D2590:241a-4: 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor du nga rgyal byas
T02D2590:241a-5: pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pas byang sgo nas dbang du

T02D2590:241a-9: zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul la /
T02D2590:241a-10: rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyis sku byin
T02D2590:241a-11: gyis brlab pa la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te

T02D2590:241a-13: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o //
T02D2590:241a-14: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te /
T02D2590:241a-15: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo brkyang la g-yas
T02D2590:241a-16: pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D2590:241a-17: dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02D2590:241a-18: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas /
T02D2590:241a-19: lag pa g-yon pa rang gi pang par bzhag ste /
T02D2590:241a-20: g-yas pas gnon pa lta bu ni mi bskyod pa'i 'o //
T02D2590:241a-21: de las g-yas mchog sbyin par bya ba ni /
T02D2590:241a-23: de nyid las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul
T02D2590:241a-24: du bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i 'o
T02D2590:241a-25: // de nyid las lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs
T02D2590:241a-26: pa sbyin par byed pa ni don yod par grub
T02D2590:241a-27: // pa'i 'o // aom bee ro tsa na dri shya ho /
T02D2590:241a-29: lhag ma rnams kyi ni rang gi mtshan brjod par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2590:241a-30: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du byas la /
T02D2590:241a-31: mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu lta bur byas te /

T02D2590:241a-33: rdo rje bcing ba las gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs
T02D2590:241a-34: gsum par mdzub mo gnyis nas gang tsam gyis ma
T02D2590:241a-35: reg par rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag pa ni m'a
T02D2590:241a-36: ma k'i'i 'o // lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du byas te /
T02D2590:241a-37: padma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni gos dkar can gyi'o //
T02D2590:241a-38: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la /
T02D2590:241a-39: mdzub mo gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te /

T02D2590:241b-3: tshul du bzhag la mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis
T02D2590:241b-4: kyi glo'i rtsa bar bzhag pa ni skul byed ma'i

T02D2590:241b-10: / sor mo lhag ma rnams so sor sbyar te /

T02D2590:241b-27: lag pa gnyis brkyang la sor mo thams cad kyis
T02D2590:241b-28: chu rlabs ltar bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i blo gros
T02D2590:241b-29: kyi'o // g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag la /

T02D2590:241b-32: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje khu tshur byas nas

T02D2590:241b-37: pa'i 'o // kyi'o // lag pa gnyis kyis sdig
T02D2590:241b-38: pa 'thor ba'i tshul du byed pa ni ngan song
T02D2590:241b-40: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar bas bsnun pa'i tshul
T02D2590:241b-41: du byas pa ni mya ngan thams cad kyi mun
T02D2590:241b-42: pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi'o //
