T02D2590:242a-7: bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog pa ni 'od dpag tu
T02D2590:242a-8: med kyi'o // g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rked
T02D2590:242a-9: par bzhag la g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur nam
T02D2590:242a-10: mkha' la yongs su bskor ba ni nam mkha' mdzod
T02D2590:242a-11: med kyi'o // kyi'o // lag pa g-yon pas sa la reg pa'i tshul du bzhag la /
T02D2590:242a-12: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mthe bo dang /
T02D2590:242a-13: mdzub mo sprad nas zhu ba'i tshul du 'jog pa
T02D2590:242a-14: ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o
T02D2590:242a-15: // lag pa gnyis kyi khu tshur nang du bcangs la /
T02D2590:242a-16: gung mo gnyis gshibs te srin lag gnyis kyang de
T02D2590:242a-17: bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las bsgreng
T02D2590:242a-18: la / mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas nas /
T02D2590:242a-19: mthe bo gnyis kyi mdun du bzhag la cung zad bkug nas kha'i tshul du byas pa ni /
T02D2590:242a-20: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2590:242a-21: g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag la /
T02D2590:242a-22: lag pa g-yas pa thal lcag gi tshul du phyar ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'o //
T02D2590:242a-23: lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la /
T02D2590:242a-24: mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du mdud pa bya ste /
T02D2590:242a-25: mdzub mo gnyis gshibs nas bzlog la smin mtshams su gzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi'o //
T02D2590:242a-26: rang gi mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan
T02D2590:242a-27: la sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i tshul du
T02D2590:242a-28: byas nas lag ngar gyi rdo rje bcings pas /
T02D2590:242a-29: mchan khung gi rtsar gzhag pa ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi'o //
T02D2590:242a-30: lag pa gnyis brkyang la mthe bos rang gi srin lag dang /
T02D2590:242a-31: mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas /
T02D2590:242a-32: lag pa g-yon pa'i nang du lag pa g-yas pa'i
T02D2590:242a-33: gung mo dang srin lag bcug la snying gar bzhag
T02D2590:242a-34: nas shubs nas 'dren pa'i tshul du drangs la /
T02D2590:242a-35: lag pa g-yas pa ral gri'i tshul du gzhag pa ni 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i 'o //
T02D2590:242a-36: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun rgyab sprad de /
T02D2590:242a-37: mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings nas mdzub
T02D2590:242a-38: mo gnyis bsgreng ba las zhags pa'i tshul du bya
T02D2590:242b-0: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i mdzub @242b mo snying gar bzhag la /
T02D2590:242b-1: g-yas pa'i khro bo'i mdzub mo be con gyi tshul
T02D2590:242b-2: du bsgreng nas gzhag pa ni dbyug sngon can gyi'o
T02D2590:242b-3: // g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag la /
T02D2590:242b-4: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brdeg pa'i tshul du bsgreng ba ni stobs po che'i 'o //
T02D2590:242b-5: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng pa ni gnod mdzes kyi'o //
T02D2590:242b-6: lag pa gnyis ka'i mthe'u chung dang /
T02D2590:242b-7: mthe bo gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud du byas te /
T02D2590:242b-8: sor mo lhag ma rnams ba dan gsum pa'i tshul du gyen du bsgreng la /
T02D2590:242b-9: stang stabs dang bcas pa'i h'um bya ba ni rdo rje sa 'og ga ste ;
T02D2590:242b-10: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D2590:242b-11: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa'i bya ba ni rgyud 'dir ma thos te /
T02D2590:242b-12: 'di dag tsam nyid kyis 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs
T02D2590:242b-13: par bcom ldan 'das kyis lung dang man ngag gis
T02D2590:242b-14: bdag cag la sogs pa 'jug pa ni 'bras bu
T02D2590:242b-16: ma thos par yongs su brtag pa des ci zhig bya //
T02D2590:242b-17: de lta na yang mgu bar ma gyur na /
T02D2590:242b-18: lce la h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bzang po rnam par bsams la /
T02D2590:242b-19: rang gi sngags nyid ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2590:242b-20: rang gi snying gar aa las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02D2590:242b-21: phyag rgya chen po las rang gi mtshan ma med
T02D2590:242b-22: par gar las byung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2590:242b-23: // rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02D2590:242b-24: sngar bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:242b-25: thal mo sbyar la sor mo'i rtse mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i 'o //
T02D2590:242b-26: de bzhin du sor mo rnams kyi rtsa ba shin tu bsngags pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'o //
T02D2590:242b-27: mthe'u chung du srin lag gi bar du mthe bo
T02D2590:242b-28: bcug la mdzub mo bkug pas bsdams pa ni rdo
T02D2590:242b-29: rje khu tshur zhes bshad de phyag rgya bcing ba
T02D2590:242b-30: thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2590:242b-31: de nas sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis dbang bskur bar
T02D2590:242b-32: gsol ba btab pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor
T02D2590:242b-33: gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa nyid dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2590:242b-34: phyag rgya sngags dang bcas pa dang gsang ba'i mchod
T02D2590:242b-35: pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2590:243a-0: des kyang gang gi dbang bskur ba'i cod @243a * //
T02D2590:243a-1: pan gang yin par gsungs pa de'i gzugs su yongs su gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:243a-2: de ltar dbang bskur nas dar dbyangs dbyang ba sngon
T02D2590:243a-3: du 'gro bas thams cad la badzra tushya ho: zhes
T02D2590:243a-4: bya ba nyid dang mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par
T02D2590:243a-5: bya'o // de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i ting nge
T02D2590:243a-6: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing rang gi thugs ka'i
T02D2590:243a-7: zla ba la bkod pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer rnams
T02D2590:243a-8: kyis phyogs kyi tshogs ma lus pa snang bar mdzad
T02D2590:243a-9: bya'o // cing / lha'i 'khor lo ma lus pa
T02D2590:243a-10: phyogs bcur sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la
T02D2590:243a-11: sogs pa sprul pa'i sprin gyis rang gi las la
T02D2590:243a-13: de la bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje
T02D2590:243a-14: ni sems can thams cad la shes rab dang ye
T02D2590:243a-15: shes kyi snang ba mdzad do //
T02D2590:243a-16: dpal rnam par snang mdzad ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rdzogs par mdzad do //
T02D2590:243a-17: mi bskyod pa ni sems kyi stobs mtha' yas pa
T02D2590:243a-18: rdzogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po
T02D2590:243a-20: rin chen 'byung ldan ni rin po che mngon par mtho ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2590:243a-21: 'od dpag tu med pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog tu rgyas pa'i chos kyi mdzod do //
T02D2590:243a-22: don yod par grub pa ni nam mkha' snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2590:243a-23: spyan ni ye shes kyi spyan gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'jo tshul lo //
T02D2590:243a-24: m'a ma k'i ni sgyu 'phrul bskyed pa'i stobs kyi ye shes zab mo nyid do //
T02D2590:243a-25: na bza' dkar mo ni padma'i gzugs kyi 'jo tshul
T02D2590:243a-26: du sangs rgyas kyi rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes
T02D2590:243a-27: kyi rdo rje'o // sgrol ma ni sems can thams
T02D2590:243a-28: cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye
T02D2590:243a-30: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhi po ni
T02D2590:243a-31: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2590:243a-32: rnams rjes su mnyes par mdzad do //
T02D2590:243a-33: skul byed ma ni rgyal ba mtha' yas pa'i ye
T02D2590:243a-34: shes skul bar byed pa'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal
T02D2590:243a-35: ba'o // rin chen sgrol ma ni rin po che'i sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa'o //
T02D2590:243a-36: khro gnyer ma ni 'jigs ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2590:243b-0: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ni rdo rje sgrog @243b 'grol ba'i ye shes so //
T02D2590:243b-1: byams pa ni byams pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02D2590:243b-2: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni nyon mongs pa sra ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D2590:243b-3: spos kyi glang po ni mi shes pa'i dregs pa sel ba'o //
T02D2590:243b-4: ye shes tog ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng pa'o //
T02D2590:243b-5: bzang skyong ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2590:243b-6: rgya mtsho'i blo gros ni mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal mtshor 'dren pa'o //
T02D2590:243b-7: blo gros mi zad pa'i ni zad mi shes shing
T02D2590:243b-8: tshad med pa'i zag pa med pa'i shes rab thob
T02D2590:243b-9: pa'o // spobs pa brtsegs pa ni mtha' yas shing sna tshogs pa'i chos rnams rab tu snang ba'o //
T02D2590:243b-10: mthu chen thob ni mi snang ba'i stobs chen po thams cad thob pa'o //
T02D2590:243b-11: ngan song thams cad spong ba ni ngan song gsum po ma lus par rnam par sbyong ba'o //
T02D2590:243b-12: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros ni /
T02D2590:243b-13: mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa la sogs pa'i mun pa ma lus par nges par 'joms pa'o //
T02D2590:243b-14: dra ba can gyi 'od ni nyon mongs pa'i dra
T02D2590:243b-15: ba ma lus par rgyun du rab tu 'jig pa'o
T02D2590:243b-16: // zla ba'i 'od ni mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad nges par 'jig pa'o //
T02D2590:243b-17: 'od dpag tu med pa ni dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer snang ba'o //
T02D2590:243b-18: nam mkha'i mdzod ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02D2590:243b-19: rin po che'i char la sogs pa 'bebs pa'o //
T02D2590:243b-20: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni sgrib pa rnam pa lnga sel ba'o //
T02D2590:243b-21: 'di dag kyang thog ma nyid du byung zhing gdod ma nas dag pa ngo bo nyid dam /
T02D2590:243b-22: yi ge med pa'i chos thugs su chud par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2590:243b-23: 'phags pa gshin rje ni gshed byed thams cad slong
T02D2590:243b-24: bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje gshin rje
T02D2590:243b-25: gsod pa'i 'dul ba la 'jug par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2590:243b-26: gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2590:243b-27: rta mgrin ni rta mchog gi rdo rje drag po rtsal lo //
T02D2590:243b-28: bdud rtsi thab sbyor ni bgegs thams cad 'jig pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2590:243b-29: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2590:243b-30: thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa'i mi g-yo ba'i
T02D2590:244a-0: ye shes kyis rnam par rol @244a * //
T02D2590:244a-2: 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni snying thams cad 'gugs pa'i rnam par rgyal pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2590:244a-3: dbyug sngon can ni cung zad rdeg pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02D2590:244a-4: stobs po che ni 'chol ba'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02D2590:244a-5: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni khams gsum ma lus pa 'dul ba'o //
T02D2590:244a-6: rdo rjes 'og ni lha ma yin dang /
T02D2590:244a-7: bdud thams cad nges par bsreg pa la bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:244a-8: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams rang rang
T02D2590:244a-9: gi las rnams mdzad cing bdag nyid kyang de dang
T02D2590:244a-10: tha mi dad par shes rab dang ye shes kyis
T02D2590:244a-11: snang ba 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2590:244a-12: chen po'i dbus na gnas par rnam par bsgoms la
T02D2590:244a-13: / rang gi ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i gzugs
T02D2590:244a-14: dang sgra la sogs pa nam mkha'i khongs thams cad
T02D2590:244a-15: khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag
T02D2590:244a-16: / par mchod la / sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang mchod par bya ste /
T02D2590:244a-17: yi ge h'um gis glu len cing gar byed pa
T02D2590:244a-18: sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rked
T02D2590:244a-19: pa'i phyogs kyi g-yas dang g-yon du bzhag la /
T02D2590:244a-20: 'gying bag dang bcas par g-yon pa'i brla cung zad phab nas gnas pa ni rdo rje sgeg mo'o //
T02D2590:244a-21: de bzhin du phreng pa bcing ba ni phreng ba ma'o //
T02D2590:244a-22: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bsgreng
T02D2590:244a-23: ba'i yu ba la g-yas pa'i mdzub mos gar byed
T02D2590:244a-25: sgeg pas lus cung zad bsgul zhing pi wang brdung ba ni glu ma'o //
T02D2590:244a-26: lag pa gnyis bsgor te bkrol la rtsi ba logs
T02D2590:244a-27: gnyis su bskor la sgeg pa'i nyams kyis rgyas pa
T02D2590:244a-28: nyid dang / spyi bor bzhag ste gar byed pa'i tshul ni gar ma'o //
T02D2590:244a-29: de bzhin du gar sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02D2590:244a-30: snying gar phab nas me tog 'bul ba ltar byed pa ni me tog ma'o //
T02D2590:244a-31: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur phan tshun rgya ba sprad la gung mo bsgreng ste /
T02D2590:244a-32: bdug spos 'bul ba ltar byed cing lag pa bskor ba ni bdug pa ma'o //
T02D2590:244a-33: de bzhin du rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i ma the bo gnyis bsgreng la /
T02D2590:244a-34: mar me 'bul ba ltar byed cid [*cing?] lag pa bskor ba ni mar me ma'o //
T02D2590:244a-35: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02D2590:244b-0: mthe bo zlum por byas @244b nas mdzub mo brkyang ste /
T02D2590:244b-1: rtse mo sbyar la yongs su bskor te /
T02D2590:244b-2: mchod yon 'bul ba ltar byas la /
T02D2590:244b-3: gar 'gro sngon du 'gro bas lag pa gnyis kyis byug pa ltar byed pa ni byug pa ma'o //
T02D2590:244b-4: 'di dag kyang rang gi phyag rgya bcing ba las
T02D2590:244b-5: byung ba'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams
T02D2590:244b-7: rnam par sgeg pa'i lag pa mchog gis gar byed pas nam mkha'i ngos ma lus par khyab pa /
T02D2590:244b-8: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa re
T02D2590:244b-9: zhig rang gi gzugs dpag tu med pas mchod pa'i
T02D2590:244b-10: sprin gyi dra ba sna tshogs rnam par sprul pas
T02D2590:244b-11: bdag nyid dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod pa byed par rnam par brtag par bya'o //
T02D2590:244b-18: aom badzra a'a lo ke / aom badzra gandhe zhes
T02D2590:244b-19: bya ba ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2590:244b-20: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i sngags yin te /
T02D2590:244b-22: de nas sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza ya
T02D2590:244b-23: h'um zhes re re zhing brjod la rdza rda brdung
T02D2590:244b-24: ba'i tshul la du la ga pas bya'o //
T02D2590:244b-25: de bzhin du zangs dung la sogs pa'i rol mo'i tshul dang /
T02D2590:244b-26: gling bu dang dung 'bud pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2590:244b-27: rnga yab ltar lag pa gnyis bya ba ni rnga yab po //
T02D2590:244b-28: nyi ma la 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya ba ni nyi ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2590:244b-29: bsil yab kyi tshul gyis lag pa bskyod pa ni bsil yab go //
T02D2590:244b-30: lag pa gnyis brkyang la srin lag gnyis ba dan
T02D2590:244b-31: gsum pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rgyal mtshan no
T02D2590:244b-32: // lag pa gnyis gyen du brkyang la rlung gis
T02D2590:244b-33: bteg pa ltar kun du bskor la 'og tu phab
T02D2590:244b-35: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rin po che'i phye
T02D2590:244b-36: ma 'gyed pa'i tshul du bya ba ni tshon gyi
T02D2590:244b-38: lag pa g-yon pa snod kyi tshul du bzhag la /
T02D2590:244b-40: rdo rje thal mo brkyang bas ni na bza' dbul ba'o //
T02D2590:244b-41: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis na bza' bskon pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2590:244b-42: lag par g-yas pas zur bzhi'i tshul du 'jam pa ltar bya ba ni khang pa brtsegs ma'o //
T02D2590:244b-43: mkhrig ma'i gong du gdu bu bcing ba ltar bya ba ni gdu bu'o //
T02D2590:244b-44: brang du do shal 'dogs pa ltar bya ba ni do shal lo //
T02D2590:245a-0: de bzhin du zhabs la zhabs gdub @245a * //
T02D2590:245a-5: sor bzhi dor bar srung skud dang /
T02D2590:245a-7: g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur du byas
T02D2590:245a-8: pa'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa kha spub ste
T02D2590:245a-10: lag pa g-yon pa phang bar bsam gtan gyi tshul du bzhag la /
T02D2590:245a-11: lag pa g-yas pa kha spub ste nam mkha' la bskor ba ni bla re'o //
T02D2590:245a-14: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2590:245a-15: de nas spyi bor thal mo khong stong du bzhag la /
T02D2590:245a-16: yi ge aom las byung ba'i gzigs ma la dang /
T02D2590:245a-19: glang po dang rta la sogs pa dang /
T02D2590:245a-21: dpag bsam gyis shing la sogs pas nam mkha'i khams
T02D2590:245a-22: khyab pa dang mnyam pas bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor
T02D2590:245a-23: gyi 'khor lo mchod par bsams la /
T02D2590:245a-24: lag pa g-yon dang g-yas kyis rim bzhin du dril bu dang /
T02D2590:245a-25: rdo rje a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i sa bon gnyis kyis blangs nas 'di brjod cid dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2590:245a-26: aom badzra ghante ra ni ta /
T02D2590:245a-28: sarbba buddha kashe tra pra tsa li ne /
T02D2590:245a-29: pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a n'a da sva bh'a be /
T02D2590:245a-30: badzra dha rma hri da ya /
T02D2590:245a-31: santo sha ni h'um h'um h'um /
T02D2590:245a-32: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang zhing bstod par bya'o //
T02D2590:245a-33: bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yi //
T02D2590:245a-34: dngos dang dngos min 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen //
T02D2590:245a-35: gang du dang po rnam par snang mdzad ni //
T02D2590:245a-36: dag cing dri med blos ni aom du sprul //
T02D2590:245a-37: gzugs mang tshul gyi phreng bas bskor ba yi //
T02D2590:245a-38: sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2590:245a-39: gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yis //
T02D2590:245a-40: spros med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs //
T02D2590:245a-41: mig gsum lha mo dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa //
T02D2590:245a-42: rdzu 'phrul tshul mang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis //
T02D2590:245a-43: gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa //
T02D2590:245a-44: lha mo dag dang lhan cig bzhad cing bzhugs //
T02D2590:245a-45: g-yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas su //
T02D2590:245a-46: g-yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu'i sgra snyan dkrol //
T02D2590:245b-0: lha mo mtha' dag @245b bcun mor gyur pa yi //
T02D2590:245b-1: dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur //
T02D2590:245b-2: gcig gi lag pa kun nas 'khyud pa ste //
T02D2590:245b-3: gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu //
T02D2590:245b-4: gsum pa mi bzod me tog phreng ba mthor //
T02D2590:245b-5: bzhi pa bde ba yi ni mda' yang 'phen //
T02D2590:245b-6: gang zhig glu 'di len par byed pa dag / bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02D2590:245b-7: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-8: yang dag mtha' gyur khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-9: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-10: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-11: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-13: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-17: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-19: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-21: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-22: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-24: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-25: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-26: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2590:245b-27: de nas mchod pa 'di dag thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2590:245b-28: aom aa nutta ra sarbba p'u dza me gha sa
T02D2590:245b-29: mungga te spa ra na ai mam ga ga na
T02D2590:245b-31: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi bdag nyid yang dag par mchod par gyur cing /
T02D2590:245b-32: thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02D2590:245b-33: mig yor tsam du shes par byas la /
T02D2590:245b-34: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba aatma ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02D2590:245b-35: de bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos gnas la //
T02D2590:245b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D2590:245b-37: dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'dis bsgom par bya'o
T02D2590:245b-39: de nas rang bzhin dag pa ste /
T02D2590:245b-40: sva bh'a wa shuddho & ham zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2590:245b-41: de nas thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du bya ste /
T02D2590:245b-42: aom sarbba sa mo& ham zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2590:246a-0: de nas rang gi sngags brjod la 'di dag thams cad ni bdag yin @246a * //
T02D2590:246a-2: g-yo ba'i dngos po'i ngo bo nyid lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na /
T02D2590:246a-3: ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med //
T02D2590:246a-4: sngags kyis lus su sbyor ba la //
T02D2590:246a-5: byang chub med cing bsgom pa med //
T02D2590:246a-7: stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can /
T02D2590:246a-8: thabs dang shes rab ro gcig pa //
T02D2590:246a-9: zag pa med pa zag med pa //
T02D2590:246a-10: nyams pa med pa'i bde ba chen po sgrub pa'i
T02D2590:246a-11: thabs sgyu ma lta bu'i mtha' yas pa'i ting nge
T02D2590:246a-12: 'dzin gyi bde ba'i gnas nam mkha' khyab pa'i ting
T02D2590:246a-13: nge 'dzin las byung ba'i dam tshig chen po'i de
T02D2590:246a-14: kho ma nyid kyi mchod pa'i sprin dang /
T02D2590:246a-15: sngar bshad pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang //
T02D2590:246a-16: kun du snang bar gnas pa'i yul rnams kyis yang
T02D2590:246a-17: dag par mchod cing dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyang
T02D2590:246a-18: rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
T02D2590:246a-19: zhugs shing dbyer me phyed la thog ma dang dbus
T02D2590:246a-20: dang tha ma dang bral bas sangs rgyas dang ;
T02D2590:246a-21: / byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'od kyi
T02D2590:246a-22: spyin mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro bas 'gro ba'i
T02D2590:246a-24: nam mkha'i gtos thams cad khyab pa /
T02D2590:246a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rings kyi rdul phra rab las bsgrubs pa /
T02D2590:246a-26: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa dang bral ba /
T02D2590:246a-27: so so rang rang gis rig par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba /
T02D2590:246a-28: mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2590:246a-29: gal te skyo bar gyur na rang gi snying ga'i
T02D2590:246a-30: zla ba la sngags kyi phreng ba mar me gsal
T02D2590:246a-31: bas khang pa'i nang snang bar byas pa ltar /
T02D2590:246a-32: lus thams cad snang bar byed pa bkod la /
T02D2590:246a-33: blo dang ldan pas bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2590:246a-34: myur ches pa dang bul ba dang //
T02D2590:246a-35: mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang /
T02D2590:246a-36: rtog pa ngan pa rnam spangs nas //
T02D2590:246a-37: de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya //
T02D2590:246a-38: zlos pa na yang lha thams cad kyi zhal nas
T02D2590:246a-39: sngags kyi sgra byung bar gyur par bsams par bya
T02D2590:246a-40: ste // de lta byus ni lha thams cad kyis bzlas par gyur pa yin no //
T02D2590:246a-41: bzlas par bya ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2590:246a-43: yang na rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i sngags /
T02D2590:246b-0: aom b'a kye da na ma: @246b aom badzra tikshna
T02D2590:246b-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul
T02D2590:246b-2: dra ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu drug pa las gsungs
T02D2590:246b-3: pa'am / bdag cag gi rmi lam du rnyed pa 'di bzla bar bya ste /
T02D2590:246b-4: aom dharmma dh'a tu w'a g'i shva ra h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:246b-5: yang na aom aa b'i ra h'um /
T02D2590:246b-6: khe tsa ra zhes bya ba'i yi ge brgyad pa'i
T02D2590:246b-7: sngags 'di ni nan song thams cad sbyongs bar byed
T02D2590:246b-8: pa / don thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
T02D2590:246b-9: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rang nyid sngags kyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2590:246b-10: ldang ba'i dus su yang bstod pa'i mchod pa byas la /
T02D2590:246b-11: mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro bas dza:h'um ba
T02D2590:246b-12: ho: zhes brjod la yid gnyis kyis rang gi lus
T02D2590:246b-13: la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nang du bcug la
T02D2590:246b-15: mthe bo gshibs par mdzub mo'i rtse mo sbyar ba'i
T02D2590:246b-16: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya snying ga las
T02D2590:246b-17: byung bas / aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:246b-18: dbang bskur ba las sor mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings te /
T02D2590:246b-19: sarbba mu dra mee dri dhi ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na bam zhes bya ba dang //
T02D2590:246b-20: go bgos la mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2590:246b-21: de na dril bu dkrol la /
T02D2590:246b-22: dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ste /
T02D2590:246b-23: yi ge brgya pas rang gis phyag rgya chen po brtan par byas nas /
T02D2590:246b-24: rang gi lha'i rgyal nyid kyis stan las 'gying bag dang bcas par langs la /
T02D2590:246b-25: dbang po thams cad kyi yul du gyur pa'i dngos
T02D2590:246b-26: po rnams rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor bas rang
T02D2590:246b-27: gi mchod pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du
T02D2590:246b-28: bsams la / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas bya ba ma lus par rdzogs par bya'o /
T02D2590:246b-29: de ltar thun mtshams dang po rdzogs nas bya ba thams cad byas te /
T02D2590:246b-30: nyi ma gung la yang lha'i khang par zhugs te /
T02D2590:246b-32: rang gi sngags dang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2590:246b-33: rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bas rang
T02D2590:246b-34: gi lha'i da rgyal byas la /
T02D2590:246b-35: re re'i rang gi sngags brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo phyung ba'am /
T02D2590:246b-36: skad cig mar rdzogs par byas la //
T02D2590:246b-37: yang dag par mchod cing legs par bstod la /
T02D2590:247a-0: dam tshig gsum blang ba'i glu'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas @247a * //
T02D2590:247a-1: nga rgyal gsum po yang dag par bskyed la mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa dang bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2590:247a-2: de nas langs la sngam bzhin du mnyam par ma
T02D2590:247a-3: bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor la spyod cing gnas par bya'o
T02D2590:247a-4: // de ltar thun gnyis rdzogs nas mtshan phyed la
T02D2590:247a-5: ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod cing
T02D2590:247a-7: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs nye ba bsags
T02D2590:247a-8: pa thams cad mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos sgrub kyi
T02D2590:247a-10: bzod pa gsol te lag pa gnyis kyi srin lag
T02D2590:247a-11: dang mthe'u chung dang mthe bo lu gu rgyud du
T02D2590:247a-12: sbrel la / gung mo dang mdzub mo brkyang bas
T02D2590:247a-13: chan pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rdo rje'i chan
T02D2590:247a-14: sbrel la / pa'i ste / des bsrung pa bshig pa'i tshul du bya bas gsal la /
T02D2590:247a-15: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings pa gyen du dgrol ba dang /
T02D2590:247a-16: snying po 'dis bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol lo ;
T02D2590:247a-17: / aom kri to ba sarbba satv'a rtha //
T02D2590:247a-18: siddhi ma datt'a y'a nu ga //
T02D2590:247a-20: pu na ra ga ma na ya tstsha /
T02D2590:247a-21: aom mu: mu: de nas sprul pa rang gi lus
T02D2590:247a-22: la bcug la snga ma bzhin du rdo rje rin
T02D2590:247a-23: chen gyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas la
T02D2590:247a-24: // shes rab dang snying rjer ldan pas seng ge'i nyal thabs su rab tu brtag par bya'o //
T02D2590:247a-25: de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhir bya ste /
T02D2590:247a-26: ji srid zla ba'am zla ba drug gam lo gcig gam /
T02D2590:247a-27: ji srid dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon sum du snang bar gyur pa'am /
T02D2590:247a-28: ji srid bye ba gnyis yongs su rdzogs 'gyur ba'am /
T02D2590:247a-29: dus ji srid kyi lha rnams kyis rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ba'am /
T02D2590:247a-30: 'gog pa'i rdo rje bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2590:247a-31: de bzhin du rnal 'byor byas la rang gi snying
T02D2590:247a-32: ga'i zla ba rang gi sngags kyi yi ge rang
T02D2590:247a-33: gi sems dang gnyis su med par gyur pa /
T02D2590:247a-34: 'od zer dkar po dpag tu mer pa dang ldan par srog rtse gcig tu bsdus la ;
T02D2590:247a-35: / ji srid yid brtan par gyur pa tsam gyis
T02D2590:247a-36: sgra la sogs pa nyer bar so sor snang ba'i
T02D2590:247a-37: 'dzin pa nye bar spong bar gyur pa de srid
T02D2590:247a-38: du bya'o / yang na rang gi snying gar nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs pa'am /
T02D2590:247b-0: mdun du gnas pa'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo @247b sprul la /
T02D2590:247b-1: thams cad gzhug cing dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2590:247b-2: cho ga rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo
T02D2590:247b-3: rjes rdzogs par nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i rim pas
T02D2590:247b-4: ji srid de ltar snang bar gyur pa'i bar du
T02D2590:247b-5: bsgom mo // de nas brtsams te rgyud thams cad du dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2590:247b-6: dngos grub thams cad kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2590:247b-7: de bzhin du rim pa gzhan dag gis kyang bdag
T02D2590:247b-8: nyid nus pa dang ldan ldan par rtogs nas dkyil
T02D2590:247b-9: 'khor bris la zla ba nya la bsgrubs na nges
T02D2590:247b-10: par dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
T02D2590:247b-11: de ltar bu'i nus pa dang ldan na rgyud 'di dang rgyud gzhan dag las gsungs pa /
T02D2590:247b-12: bu mo las sogs pa'i sgrub pa chen po dang /
T02D2590:247b-13: gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa'i sgrub pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba yin no //
T02D2590:247b-14: de lta bu'i nga rgyal brtan par gyur pa nyid dam /
T02D2590:247b-15: rgyun mi 'chad par slob pa la 'jug pa'i las
T02D2590:247b-16: dang po pa rnams la yang mchod rten gyi las
T02D2590:247b-17: rnams dang phyag bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan
T02D2590:247b-18: 'das kyis dgag pa mdzad pa ni thams cad las
T02D2590:247b-19: mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir rnal 'byor 'di las lhag
T02D2590:247b-20: pa'i nan tan nyams su len pa med pa'i phyir
T02D2590:247b-21: ro // gang yang thal mal pa'i rnam par rtog
T02D2590:247b-22: pa la gnas pa des ni mchod rten kyi las
T02D2590:247b-23: dang byas ba la sogs pa bsod nams su bya
T02D2590:247b-24: ba'i dngos po'i tha snyad du bya ba thams cad
T02D2590:247b-25: nyams su blang bar bya ba'i nyid yin te //
T02D2590:247b-26: 'di lam zhu ba za ba lta bur gang rang
T02D2590:247b-27: nyid tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa la gnas
T02D2590:247b-28: bzhin du sngar bshad pa mi byed pa ni mi
T02D2590:247b-29: rigs so // mnyam par gzhag pa la gnas pa na yang mchod pa dang /
T02D2590:247b-31: mchod pa byed pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi
T02D2590:247b-32: dbye ba'i rnam par rtog pa las rnam par grol
T02D2590:247b-33: ba la rang gi lha'i sbyor bas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2590:247b-34: kyis gnang ba nyid yin te /
T02D2590:247b-36: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis /
T02D2590:247b-37: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2590:247b-39: gzhan du ji ltar na shin tu byang bar bslabs
T02D2590:247b-40: pa med par zab cing rgya chen pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2590:247b-41: kyi dngos po rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bas na
T02D2590:247b-42: de dang tha dad pa ni spang bar bya ste
T02D2590:248a-0: / phyag bya ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i rtog pa @248a * //
T02D2590:248a-1: de nyid tha mal pa'i kun du rtog pa yin pas /
T02D2590:248a-2: rang rang gi dngos por yongs su rtog pa ji ltar spong bar 'gyur //
T02D2590:248a-3: bdag nyid la bdag nyid mchod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs par gsungs te //
T02D2590:248a-4: 'di ni rnal 'byor pa de las so so'i sbyor
T02D2590:248a-5: bas rang gi lha'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo mngon
T02D2590:248a-6: sum du bya ba nyid skye 'gyur gyi /
T02D2590:248a-7: zab cing rgya chen po'i bdag nyid dngos po rdzogs
T02D2590:248a-8: pa'i rgyu nyid du mchod rten gyi las dang phyag
T02D2590:248a-9: bya ba la sogs pa de ga la 'gyur /
T02D2590:248a-10: gzhan du na gal te bla ma rnams la bsnyen
T02D2590:248a-11: bkur ma byas pas thos pa med cing shes rab
T02D2590:248a-12: ma sbyangs pa de nyid ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal
T02D2590:248a-13: gyis mchod rten gyi la las sogs pa mi byed
T02D2590:248a-14: pa ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyu yin no //
T02D2590:248a-15: shin tu spros pas chog go //
T02D2590:248a-16: gang zhig dam tshig tsam 'dod pa'i phyir /
T02D2590:248a-18: des bsgoms pas dge ba'i mtshan ma cung zad cig rnyed pa'am /
T02D2590:248a-19: bsgom pa mi nus pas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyi re re zhing 'bum phrag gcig gam /
T02D2590:248a-20: yang na dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i 'bum phrag gsum
T02D2590:248a-21: gzhan dag gi bzlas brjod khri byas la bri bar
T02D2590:248a-22: bya'o // ting nges 'dzin gsum bsgom pa ni 'dir
T02D2590:248a-23: thos pa med de rgyud gzhan las mthong ba las
T02D2590:248a-24: ltos med du bya ba ni ha cang thal ches
T02D2590:248a-25: bya'o // so // yang na don gyi bsgom pa'i
T02D2590:248a-26: rjes su 'brangs nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mid du
T02D2590:248a-27: bya ba la nyes pa med do //
T02D2590:248a-28: nyin te zhing yang lha'i khang pa'i phyi rol du
T02D2590:248a-29: dpung bzangs kyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad
T02D2590:248a-31: rjes su mthun pa'i gtor ma mtshan mo sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2590:248a-32: de ltar mkhas shin byang ba'i sngon du bsnyen pa'i 'di bshad pa'i //
T02D2590:248a-33: bsod nams 'dis ni 'gro la phan pa'i dngos grib 'byung gyur cing //
T02D2590:248a-34: bdag kyang ji srid nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug srid gsum la //
T02D2590:248a-35: phan pa mdzad pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang skur gcig nyid gyur cig //
T02D2590:248a-36: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2590:248a-37: rnam par rtog spangs zab cing rgya che la /
T02D2590:248a-38: sna tshogs sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing /
T02D2590:248a-39: rnam dag rig dang gnyis med sku 'chang ba //
T02D2590:248a-40: 'dod lha 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2590:248b-0: de ltar sngon du bsnyen @248b pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad yang dag par bsags na /
T02D2590:248b-1: tshes grangs dang gza' rgyu skar dang /
T02D2590:248b-2: byed pa la sogs pa shis pa la snga dro'i dus su grogs bzang po dang /
T02D2590:248b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yongs su brtag par bya ste /
T02D2590:248b-8: byang gi phyogs kyi cha mdor na sa gzhi bzang zhing snum pa /
T02D2590:248b-9: zug rngu'i nyes pa dang bral ba /
T02D2590:248b-10: shar ram byang du gzhol ba /
T02D2590:248b-11: me tog gi shing la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D2590:248b-13: yang na yin mngon par dga' ba gang yang rung ba der brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:248b-14: de nas bdag po 'i sbyor ba byas las /
T02D2590:248b-15: gnas kyi bdag po la sogs pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa byas nas blang bar bya'o //
T02D2590:248b-16: gal te rmi lam la sogs pa de thob par ma gyur na //
T02D2590:248b-17: de'i tshe nyin zhag gzhan gyi nyi ma'i gung la
T02D2590:248b-18: dkyil khor gyi sa'i dbus su khro bo'i nga rgyal
T02D2590:248b-19: dang ldan pas dug dang khrag dang /
T02D2590:248b-20: lan tshva ba la sogs pa dang /

T02D2590:252a-7: rnam par thar ba'i sgo bzhi po'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2590:252a-8: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon
T02D2590:252a-9: tan gyi tshogs rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2590:252a-10: ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba'i padma byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su gang ba /
T02D2590:252a-11: 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho lta bu bsams la /
T02D2590:252a-12: der yang hri gnas pa las byung ba'i padma nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa dang /
T02D2590:252a-13: mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi lte ba la
T02D2590:252a-14: aa las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje de'i steng
T02D2590:252a-15: du chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya zur gsum par
T02D2590:252a-16: gnas pa'i yi ge bhr'um gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
T02D2590:252a-17: pa las byung ba'i rnam par snad mdzad rig pa
T02D2590:252a-18: dang bcas pa las byug ba'i thub pa'i dbang po
T02D2590:252a-19: dpag tu med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bas
T02D2590:252a-20: phyogs bcu'i tshogs thams cad khyab pa /
T02D2590:252a-21: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa chen po'i khyad
T02D2590:252a-22: par gyis brgyan pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
T02D2590:252a-23: tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang chos kyi dbyings
T02D2590:252a-24: kyi ngo bo nyid ri gangs can ltar dkar ba'i
T02D2590:252a-25: mchod rten chen po'i nang du chud pa /
T02D2590:252a-26: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs gnas rin po
T02D2590:252a-27: che ma lus pa las bsgrubs pa'i bdag nyid can
T02D2590:252a-28: gnas gtsang ma'i steng na gzhal yas khang sgyu ma
T02D2590:252a-29: lta bu mig yor tsam du snang ba rnam par
T02D2590:252a-30: bsams la / sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis phur bu dang /
T02D2590:252a-34: phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas gnas te /
T02D2590:252a-35: 'di ltar 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrug pa /
T02D2590:252a-36: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2590:252a-37: bsang gtor la sogs pa yang dag par sbyangs te /
T02D2590:252a-38: sgo bzhi dang mtshams bzhir spos snod la sogs pa dang glu dang rol mo dang /
T02D2590:252a-39: gar la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2590:252a-40: lag pas bram zhing dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags
T02D2590:252a-41: lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang bcas pa'i yi ge brgya
T02D2590:252a-42: pa lan bdun yang dag par bzlas nas /
T02D2590:252b-0: de @252b nyid du yid mnyam par bzhag nas nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2590:252b-1: sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2590:252b-2: de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la nang par nyid du bdag po'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2590:252b-3: yi ge bam las byung ba'i sa'i lha mo lag
T02D2590:252b-4: na bum pa thogs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag
T02D2590:252b-5: rgyas bkug la dbus su gnas pa la dgug pa
T02D2590:252b-6: la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par
T02D2590:252b-7: mchod de / lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2590:252b-8: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2590:252b-9: spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par dang //
T02D2590:252b-10: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D2590:252b-11: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D2590:252b-12: dngos grub thams cad 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02D2590:252b-13: bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D2590:252b-14: zhes lan gsum brjod pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2590:252b-15: de nas phyi dro'i dus su khrus bya zhing lus dris bsgos la /
T02D2590:252b-16: ji snyed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan te /
T02D2590:252b-17: shin tu dmar po'i gos bgo ba dang /
T02D2590:252b-18: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing kha dri zhim por byas pa dang /
T02D2590:252b-19: dkyil 'khor gyi sa dris nye bar byugs la me
T02D2590:252b-20: tog gi dri zhim po dang dris nye bar mdzes
T02D2590:252b-21: par snga ma bzhin du byas la dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2590:252b-23: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pas bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas //
T02D2590:252b-24: rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs par byas nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste /
T02D2590:252b-25: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2590:252b-26: deng ni bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02D2590:252b-27: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2590:252b-28: lha dang dam tshig bri mnyam par //
T02D2590:252b-29: gyur par bdag ni som nyi med //
T02D2590:252b-30: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02D2590:252b-31: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
T02D2590:252b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02D2590:252b-33: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02D2590:252b-34: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02D2590:252b-35: bdag gi mchog sbyin bla na med //
T02D2590:252b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02D2590:252b-37: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02D2590:252b-38: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D2590:252b-39: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02D2590:252b-40: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02D2590:252b-41: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2590:252b-42: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02D2590:253a-3: dkyil 'khor spro ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du bskyed la /
T02D2590:253a-4: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gnas na gnas shing de'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa /
T02D2590:253a-5: de'i gsang sngags zlos pa la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2590:253a-6: pa la nam mkha'i ngos nas mi bskyod pa la
T02D2590:253a-7: sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sam
T02D2590:253a-8: / de'i phyag rgya'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sgrub
T02D2590:253a-9: pa'i grogs mchog thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2590:253a-10: bri bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid la gsol ba
T02D2590:253a-11: / 'debs par gyur // par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:253a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02D2590:253a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D2590:253a-14: chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D2590:253a-15: mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02D2590:253a-16: mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs pa //
T02D2590:253a-17: kun du bzang po'i sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D2590:253a-18: zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung //
T02D2590:253a-19: ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba //
T02D2590:253a-20: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D2590:253a-21: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02D2590:253a-22: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
T02D2590:253a-23: kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur //
T02D2590:253a-24: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D2590:253a-25: de nas langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2590:253a-26: kyis nam mkha' kun du gang bar bsams nas de'i
T02D2590:253a-27: zhabs la phyag byas la nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o
T02D2590:253a-28: // bdag nyid rdo rje can rang nyid //
T02D2590:253a-29: 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag rang nyid //
T02D2590:253a-30: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02D2590:253a-31: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin //
T02D2590:253a-32: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag / phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag ste //
T02D2590:253a-33: bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag / byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro //
T02D2590:253a-34: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang bas h'um
T02D2590:253a-35: badzrong tishtha zhes bya ba ji ltar sprul pa'i 'khor
T02D2590:253a-36: lo nam mkha'i phyogs su bteg la /
T02D2590:253a-37: snga ma bzhin du g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2590:253a-38: stang stabs kyis sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du
T02D2590:253a-39: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la gzhal
T02D2590:253b-1: de'i 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du yi ge h'um las byung ba /
T02D2590:253b-5: phyag bzhi pa rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D2590:253b-6: rdo rje'i rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bsams la /
T02D2590:253b-7: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye ste /
T02D2590:253b-8: 'dis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
T02D2590:253b-9: aom badzra mandal la h'um mdza: rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2590:253b-10: gnyis kyis mdzub mo dang mthe bo'i rdo rje ni
T02D2590:253b-11: 'di'i phyag rgya'o // de nas yongs su gyur pa
T02D2590:253b-12: las zur bzhi la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dkyil
T02D2590:253b-13: 'khor chen po'i rnam pa 'dir byin gyis brlab par
T02D2590:253b-14: 'di'i phyag rgya'o // bya'o // aom ma h'a badzra tsakra aa dhi tishtha siddhi h'um /
T02D2590:253b-15: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2590:253b-16: de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu sngar bshad pa'i bsam gtan gyi phur bu lta bu la /
T02D2590:253b-18: srad bu dmar po dang phreng ba dmar pos dkris pa bzhi la bzlas brjod lan brgya bya ste /
T02D2590:253b-19: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung nas g-yas pas rdo
T02D2590:253b-20: rje 'bar ba'i tho ba tsandan dmar pos byugs shing
T02D2590:253b-22: me tog dmar pos dkris pas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir gdab par bya'o //
T02D2590:253b-23: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya /
T02D2590:253b-25: rdo rje phur bu'i sngags so //
T02D2590:253b-26: aom badzra mudga ra aa ko ta ya h'um /
T02D2590:253b-28: sngags bshad pa'i mtha' yas dang rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pas gnas lngar phur bus gdab pa'am /
T02D2590:253b-29: phyag rgyas phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D2590:253b-30: rdo rje bsdams pa las nang du bcings la gung
T02D2590:253b-31: mo gnyis gshibs te mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe
T02D2590:253b-32: bo'i steng du gzhag pa ni phur bus gdab pa'i
T02D2590:253b-33: phyag rgya'o // de nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis
T02D2590:253b-34: bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas la de nyid
T02D2590:253b-35: zos pa'i grogs kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi dris
T02D2590:253b-37: me tog dri zhim po'i sil mas nye bar mdzes par byed du bcug la /
T02D2590:253b-38: de bzhin du rang gi bdag po'i sbyor ba dang
T02D2590:253b-39: ldan pas h'um zlos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang
T02D2590:253b-40: / lha thams cad kyi gnas su dri'i dkyil 'khor bya'o //
T02D2590:254a-1: sam rang rang gi sngags kyis dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams bton la /
T02D2590:254a-2: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas /
T02D2590:254a-3: sngar bshad pa'i spyan drangs pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis nam mkha'i gnas nas phab ste /
T02D2590:254a-4: gcig tu byas la sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis
T02D2590:254a-5: brlab pa sngon du 'gro bas rang gi sngags dang
T02D2590:254a-6: phyag rgya dang bcas pa nye bar brtan la /
T02D2590:254a-7: dbang bskur nas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2590:254a-8: legs par bstod nas phyag bya'o //
T02D2590:254a-9: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa mchu 'phyang ba dang /
T02D2590:254a-12: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2590:254a-13: ras kyis mgul ba bcings pa /
T02D2590:254a-14: 'dab ma dri zhim po dang 'bras bus kha bkab pa /
T02D2590:254a-15: rang gi bdag po'i mtshan mas mtshan pa blangs la /
T02D2590:254a-16: kanda ka ri dkar po dang /
T02D2590:254a-19: gi ri ka ra ni dkar po dang /
T02D2590:254a-31: mu tig dang nor bu ste /
T02D2590:254a-32: rin po che lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D2590:254a-33: yi ge bam las rin po che'i rang bzhin du bskyed la /
T02D2590:254a-34: bdag po'i sngags dang yi ge h'um re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02D2590:254a-35: stong rtsa brgyad mchod yon la yongs su bzlas te
T02D2590:254a-36: bum pa'i steng du bzhag nas chu cung zad bcug
T02D2590:254a-37: la / de'i dbus su pam las byung ba'i padma
T02D2590:254a-38: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams
T02D2590:254a-39: la / la / der lha rnams kyi 'khor lo
T02D2590:254a-40: rang gi dam tshig gi gnas pas bzhugs par yi
T02D2590:254a-41: la / la / ge h'um ngam / rang gi sngags kyis bsams la /
T02D2590:254a-42: de las byung ba'i byang chub kyi chus yongs su
T02D2590:254a-43: gang bar bsgoms nas rdo rje sems mas yongs su
T02D2590:254a-44: bzung ba'i me tog gi lcug mas rdo rje dang
T02D2590:254a-45: bcas pa dang / dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad kyi sngags mngon par bzlas la /
T02D2590:254a-46: aom badzrod ka h'um zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te /
T02D2590:254a-47: bdud rtsi thab sbyor yongs su bzlas pa'i me tog bcug la /
T02D2590:254a-49: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2590:254b-1: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2590:254b-2: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor du bzhag nas kyang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags dang /
T02D2590:254b-3: yi ge h'um gnyis mngon par bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2590:254b-4: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2590:254b-5: de nas phyi rol du song ste phyogs kyi gtor
T02D2590:254b-6: ma byin nas lha rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2590:254b-7: / sbyin sreg kyang byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi sar zhugs te /
T02D2590:254b-8: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lce bsams la /
T02D2590:254b-9: aom padma sa ra sva sti /
T02D2590:254b-10: sa tyam aa brta ya sho ya h'um hr'i:ra:hr'i:zhes bya
T02D2590:254b-11: bas lce byin gyis brlabs la spos snod lag na
T02D2590:254b-12: thogs shing lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02D2590:254b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2590:254b-14: thugs brtse phan pa'i dgongs pa can //
T02D2590:254b-15: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2590:254b-16: rdo rje can bdag 'di zhes bya //
T02D2590:254b-18: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang /
T02D2590:254b-19: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2590:254b-20: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
T02D2590:254b-21: nang par bdag ni bri bar bgyid //
T02D2590:254b-22: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D2590:254b-23: thugs brtse nye bar bzung nas ni //
T02D2590:254b-24: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2590:254b-25: byin gyis rlob par mdzod du gsol //
T02D2590:254b-26: sras dang bcas par gshegs nas ni //
T02D2590:254b-27: sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzod //
T02D2590:254b-28: de nas sems can thams cad lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D2590:254b-29: de la dang por re zhig slob ma legs par khrus byas shing /
T02D2590:254b-30: gos gtsang ma bgos te lag na me tog thogs
T02D2590:254b-31: pas slob dpon la phyag byas la 'di skad ces
T02D2590:254b-32: brjod par bya'o // dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas //
T02D2590:254b-33: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2590:254b-34: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2590:254b-35: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2590:254b-36: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02D2590:254b-37: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D2590:254b-38: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2590:254b-39: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D2590:254b-40: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D2590:254b-41: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyid //
T02D2590:255a-0: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pa @255a * //
T02D2590:255a-1: la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2590:255a-2: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02D2590:255a-3: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02D2590:255a-4: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02D2590:255a-5: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D2590:255a-6: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02D2590:255a-7: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02D2590:255a-8: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams //
T02D2590:255a-9: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag / de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02D2590:255a-10: cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas //
T02D2590:255a-11: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02D2590:255a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02D2590:255a-13: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02D2590:255a-14: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D2590:255a-15: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02D2590:255a-16: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02D2590:255a-17: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2590:255a-18: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas /
T02D2590:255a-19: skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2590:255a-20: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2590:255a-21: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D2590:255a-22: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
T02D2590:255a-23: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D2590:255a-24: yang phyag la sogs pa rgya cher byed du gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2590:255a-25: gang zhig mi mkhyen cung zad med //
T02D2590:255a-26: 'gro la'ang rtag tu skyabs mdzad pa'i //
T02D2590:255a-27: bde bar gshegs dang dam pa'i chos //
T02D2590:255a-28: tshogs chen bcas la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2590:255a-29: 'jig rten sdug bsngal ldan skyob cing //
T02D2590:255a-30: de yi sdug bsngal nyid gzir ba'i //
T02D2590:255a-31: gtso la kun nas dad pa yis //
T02D2590:255a-32: de nyid la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2590:255a-33: kun nas rnam pa thams cad du //
T02D2590:255a-34: de nge mnyes pa la ngas byas te //
T02D2590:255a-35: de rnams la ni bdag dbul gyis //
T02D2590:255a-36: khyed ni kun du bdag bzhes shig / sdig pa ma lus bshags bgyi zhing //
T02D2590:255a-37: slar yang de ltar yong mi bgyid //
T02D2590:255a-38: bdag dang gzhan gyis gang byas pa'i //
T02D2590:255a-39: dge ba kun la rje yi rang ;
T02D2590:255a-40: / rdzogs sangs dam chos ston par mdzod //
T02D2590:255a-41: nam yang mya ngan 'da' ma mdzad //
T02D2590:255a-42: sems can rnams ni bde mdzad de //
T02D2590:255a-43: go 'phang mchog ni thob par mdzod //
T02D2590:255a-44: skal chen sangs rgyas de sras kyis //
T02D2590:255a-45: ji ltar byang chub thugs bskyed pa //
T02D2590:255b-0: de ltar bla med byang chub @255b sems //
T02D2590:255b-1: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2590:255b-2: bdag ni thams cad mkhyen gyur nas //
T02D2590:255b-3: kun gyi dbang phyug gnas 'dug ste //
T02D2590:255b-4: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' med de //
T02D2590:255b-5: 'gro ba thams cad bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D2590:255b-6: sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyu la yang //
T02D2590:255b-7: ci yong stobs kyis 'jug bgyi zhing //
T02D2590:255b-8: der zhen de bzhin brtan pa yis //
T02D2590:255b-9: smon lam 'di ni bdag bgyid do //
T02D2590:255b-10: de bzhin skye ba thams cad du //
T02D2590:255b-11: de yi thabs la brtson pa dang //
T02D2590:255b-12: nyes bral yon tan ldan pa ste //
T02D2590:255b-13: dbang phyug phun tshogs kun thob shog / bdag gis dge ba gang bgyis dang //
T02D2590:255b-14: gang yang bgyid du stsal ba yang //
T02D2590:255b-15: des ni bdag dang 'gro ba kun //
T02D2590:255b-16: bde gshegs go 'phang 'grub par shog / de nas
T02D2590:255b-17: slob dpon gyis yi ge h'um bzlas pa'i spos snying
T02D2590:255b-18: gar gtor la / de nyid kyis slob ma la
T02D2590:255b-19: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pa snying
T02D2590:255b-20: gar gtor la / gar gtugs te / rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam pa dang /
T02D2590:255b-21: spyi bor yang sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:255b-22: de nas h'um gis spyi bor me tog sbyin zhing /
T02D2590:255b-23: bdug spos kyis bdug pa dang /
T02D2590:255b-24: mar me'i snang ba yang byas la /
T02D2590:255b-25: de nyid kyis yongs su bzlas pa'i au dumw'a ra dang /
T02D2590:255b-26: aa shvadtha sor bcu gnyis pa rma med pa /
T02D2590:255b-28: rtse mo me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i so shing /
T02D2590:255b-29: slob ma thal mo sbyar zhing kha byang du bltas pa la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2590:255b-30: des kyang ba'i ko ba tsam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la /
T02D2590:255b-31: shar du bltas nas rtse mo nas bca' ste /
T02D2590:255b-32: mi dgos par mdun du ltos pa med par dor bar bya'o //
T02D2590:255b-33: de la bdag la bltas te lhung na bgegs med par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2590:255b-34: gal te kha gyen du bltas pas lhung na /
T02D2590:255b-36: kha thur du bltas te lhung bas ni //
T02D2590:255b-38: skor phyogs kyi rin gyis shar la sogs par kha bltas te lhung na ni rgyas pa dang /
T02D2590:255b-42: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du lhung na ni //
T02D2590:256a-0: de nas yi ge bam las byung zhing de nyid bzlas pa'i chus 'thor @256a * //
T02D2590:256a-2: aom hr'i: bi shu ddha dha rmm'a: sarbba p'a pa ni shtsa aa sya bi shodhya /
T02D2590:256a-3: sarbba bi ka wa aa pa na h'um zhes bzlas
T02D2590:256a-4: pa'i spos chu'i khyor chu gsum 'thung du bcug la
T02D2590:256a-5: / yi ge hr'i: las bskyed cing de nyid bzas
T02D2590:256a-6: pa'i ku sha gar zhing ma 'khrugs pa gcig sngas
T02D2590:256a-8: ku sha gnyis pa ham gi sa bon las bskyed cing /
T02D2590:256a-9: de nyid bzlas pa stan gyi phyir sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2590:256a-10: de nas yi ge h'um mngon par bzlas shing //
T02D2590:256a-11: yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas pa'i srid bu
T02D2590:256a-12: gsum sgril mdud pa gsum dang ldan pas de rnams
T02D2590:256a-13: kyi dpung pa g-yas par rang nyid bcings la /
T02D2590:256a-14: rdo rje go chags yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02D2590:256a-15: chos bshad pas gzengs bstod par bya'o //
T02D2590:256a-16: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02D2590:256a-17: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02D2590:256a-18: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
T02D2590:256a-19: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //
T02D2590:256a-20: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02D2590:256a-21: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa'i //
T02D2590:256a-22: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02D2590:256a-23: sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2590:256a-24: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D2590:256a-25: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D2590:256a-26: khyed rnams der ni dong bas ni //
T02D2590:256a-27: rang byung skal ba chen po pa //
T02D2590:256a-28: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02D2590:256a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02D2590:256a-30: yod dang med las rnam par 'das //
T02D2590:256a-31: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02D2590:256a-32: zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyi //
T02D2590:256a-33: rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa //
T02D2590:256a-34: spros pa kun dang phral ba ste //
T02D2590:256a-35: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa ;
T02D2590:256a-36: / las dang bya ba la sogs bral //
T02D2590:256a-37: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
T02D2590:256a-38: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni //
T02D2590:256a-39: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
T02D2590:256a-40: bzhin bzangs longs shig / nang par 'jam dpal rdo rje'i bka' drin gyis //
T02D2590:256a-41: dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis /
T02D2590:256a-42: ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam rnams kyang smros shig ces brjod la gtang bar bya'o //
T02D2590:256a-43: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su zhugs te /
T02D2590:256a-44: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas //
T02D2590:256b-0: dkyil 'khor pa de rnams thams cad snga ma @256b bzhin du bteg ste //
T02D2590:256b-1: gzhal yas khang shel ltar dang zhing dri ma med pa'i dbus su bzhag la /
T02D2590:256b-2: steng dang 'og tu gnas pa'i yi ge bam dang h'um gi bar du chud par byas nas /
T02D2590:256b-3: aom gnyis las bskyed pa'i kha sbyar gyi nang du
T02D2590:256b-4: chud par bsgom par bya ba'am rdo rje'i lam nas
T02D2590:256b-5: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su
T02D2590:256b-7: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i mthar slob ma'i gtso bo dang
T02D2590:256b-8: lhan cig yid bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pas
T02D2590:256b-9: seng ge'i nyal stabs su nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2590:256b-10: zhag gnyis pa la lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2590:256b-11: de las gzhan pa'i nyi ma gsum pa la rmi
T02D2590:256b-12: lam ngan pa la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dam
T02D2590:256b-13: / spyan la sogs pa'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas zhi bar bya'o //
T02D2590:256b-14: yang na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes lhag par mos par byas la /
T02D2590:256b-15: las thams cad pa'i bum pa yang 'jug pa'i sgor
T02D2590:256b-16: mngon par phyogs par bsang gtor gyi don du gzhag
T02D2590:256b-17: ste / dkyil 'khor bri ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:256b-18: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas sngon po dang /
T02D2590:256b-22: ser po'i tshon rtsi dri zhim pos yungs kar gyi phye ma dang bsres pas /
T02D2590:256b-23: so sor kha bsgyur ba'i srad bu rim pa nyid kyis bzhag la /
T02D2590:256b-25: zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu rnams la bkod de //
T02D2590:256b-26: sa bon de rnams nyid kyis rang gi phyogs na
T02D2590:256b-27: bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kar
T02D2590:256b-28: rang rang gi kha dog ji lta bu'i 'od kyi
T02D2590:256b-29: srad bur gnas par bsams la /
T02D2590:256b-30: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab pa'i phyir //
T02D2590:256b-31: rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsal du gsol zhes mi
T02D2590:256b-32: bskyod pa la sogs pa la yang dag par bskul
T02D2590:256b-33: la / aom d'i pta dri shti aam ku sha dza: zhes bya ba mig tu bkod nas /
T02D2590:256b-34: rab tu g-yo bar byed pa'i mig / mig gi
T02D2590:256b-35: rdzi ma 'dren par byed pa'i lta bas 'od kyi
T02D2590:256b-36: srad bu mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs ka
T02D2590:256b-37: nas / de rnams nyid btang ste drangs nas de rnams kyis /
T02D2590:257a-0: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu la kun du @257a * //
T02D2590:257a-2: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarbba dha rmma
T02D2590:257a-3: pa ra spa ra aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharmma
T02D2590:257a-4: aa tayan ta aa nu pra bishta sarbba dha rmma
T02D2590:257a-5: zhes bya ba dang yi ge h'um brjod la bsgril
T02D2590:257a-6: te / ma dang ta gnyis las nyi ma dang /
T02D2590:257a-7: zla ba gnyis su bskyed la /
T02D2590:257a-8: badzra dri ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas /
T02D2590:257a-9: dri dkar po'i chu dang ldan pa'i gser la sogs
T02D2590:257a-10: pa'i snod kyi nang du srad du de bzhag la
T02D2590:257a-13: spos la sogs pas kyang mchod do //
T02D2590:257a-14: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram ma ti kra
T02D2590:257a-15: ma h'um zhes bya ba rdo rje khu tshur gyis
T02D2590:257a-16: bzung la // lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2590:257a-17: de nas yi ge h'um dang /
T02D2590:257a-18: dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams kyi sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2590:257a-19: de nas yang dkyil 'khor pa'i sa gzhi dris nye bar byugs la /
T02D2590:257a-20: me tog gi sil ma gtor te /
T02D2590:257a-21: de nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam
T02D2590:257a-22: pa'i rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa mngon par dmigs
T02D2590:257a-23: la / mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro ba'i dri la sogs pa dang /
T02D2590:257a-24: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de //
T02D2590:257a-25: phyag byas nas rang nyid de'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
T02D2590:257a-26: rang gi snying ga nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog bdung rtsi thab sbyor gyi gzugs su sprul la /
T02D2590:257a-27: mig g-yas dang g-yon du dza: las byung ba'i zla ba dang /
T02D2590:257a-28: nyi ma ser por snang ba bsams /
T02D2590:257a-29: yi ge h'um bzlas pa'i yungs kar dkar po dang /
T02D2590:257a-30: dri dkar po'i chus spangs te /
T02D2590:257a-31: chur dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la sboms su sgo'i nyi shu'i cha'i srad bu de //
T02D2590:257a-32: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas /
T02D2590:257a-33: lte bar 'dzin cing yi ge dza: thig de sgrub
T02D2590:257a-34: pa'i grogs po'i lag tu aom dza: dza: zhes bya
T02D2590:257a-35: bas btang ngo // sgrub pa'i grogs kyis kyang rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02D2590:257a-36: dza: dza: dza: zhes bya bas drangs nas de bzhin du sngon du phyogs par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2590:257a-37: de la phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs te /
T02D2590:257a-38: slob dpon shar dang byang du bltas la /
T02D2590:257a-40: tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab par bya'o //
T02D2590:257a-42: dang por rdo rje dang khu tshur gyis srad bu de bzung la /
T02D2590:257b-0: phyis ni ci bde bar thig gdab par bshad @257b do ;
T02D2590:257b-1: / mtshan ma med pas dngos mi 'grub //
T02D2590:257b-2: srad bu chad na bla ma 'chi //
T02D2590:257b-3: ring thung khyer na na par 'gyur //
T02D2590:257b-5: slob dpon me dang rlung gi phyogs su 'dug ste /
T02D2590:257b-8: lha dang klu'i phyogs su mngon par bltas la ;
T02D2590:257b-13: yang me'i phyogs su gnas te /
T02D2590:257b-15: bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas te /
T02D2590:257b-16: dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar du srad bu brkyang bar bya ba dang /
T02D2590:257b-22: dkyil 'khor brgyad du yang rim pa 'di nyid kyis 'gyur ro //
T02D2590:257b-23: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram /
T02D2590:257b-24: ma ti kra ma h'um zhes bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2590:257b-25: thig gdab pa'i sgras kyang nam mkha' khyab pa'i de
T02D2590:257b-26: bzhin gshegs pa rnams la khyed kyis sems can gyi
T02D2590:257b-27: don mdzad pa'i dus lags pas ;
T02D2590:257b-28: 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2590:257b-29: khru stong gi tshad nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02D2590:257b-30: khru gang gi bar du dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2590:257b-31: slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog thams cad du yang g-yas nas bskor te 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2590:257b-32: gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang ;
T02D2590:257b-33: / rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis pa //
T02D2590:257b-34: thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa //
T02D2590:257b-35: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2590:257b-36: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad dang /
T02D2590:257b-37: sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su //
T02D2590:257b-38: rdo rje rin chen spras par ni //
T02D2590:257b-39: dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo //
T02D2590:257b-40: de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la ;
T02D2590:257b-41: / de nyid de dang 'dra ba la //
T02D2590:257b-42: phyi yi 'khor lo phyed kyi tshad //
T02D2590:257b-43: thams cad de 'dra rta babs med //
T02D2590:257b-44: rim pa nang par zhugs nas ni //
T02D2590:257b-45: de yi phyed kyis gsum pa ni //
T02D2590:257b-46: rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor //
T02D2590:257b-47: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa //
T02D2590:257b-48: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su //
T02D2590:257b-49: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan //
T02D2590:257b-50: de nas hr'i dang khro lta bas //
T02D2590:257b-51: sgo ni rnam par dbye bar bya //
T02D2590:257b-52: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste //
T02D2590:257b-53: kha khyer med pa dag tu 'dod //
T02D2590:257b-54: sgo khyud sgo yi tshad du ste //
T02D2590:257b-55: lha yi snam bu'ang de dang 'dra //
T02D2590:257b-56: kha khyer kun du sgo yi phyed //
T02D2590:258a-2: dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang //
T02D2590:258a-3: dar dang me tog phreng snam bu //
T02D2590:258a-4: tshon gyi sa ni de yi phyed //
T02D2590:258a-5: rtsa ba'i thig sa'i phyi rol du //
T02D2590:258a-6: rdo rje la sogs ka ba'i thig / sa ni tshon gyis sa dad mnyam //
T02D2590:258a-7: sgo las sgo khyud sum 'gyur te //
T02D2590:258a-8: ba dan dril bu rnams dang ldan //
T02D2590:258a-9: dril gdags rlung gis bskyod pa yi //
T02D2590:258a-10: ba dan chu yi mtshams su bya //
T02D2590:258a-11: gzhal rnams 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par //
T02D2590:258a-12: ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag / gal te thig 'debs 'os pa ni //
T02D2590:258a-14: phur bus brtod pas grogs med par //
T02D2590:258a-15: de bzhin thig ni gdab par bya //
T02D2590:258a-16: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar snga ma bzhin du //
T02D2590:258a-17: steng dang 'og tu rtse mo lnga pa dang /
T02D2590:258a-18: gcig pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i phur bus btab la //
T02D2590:258a-19: de la btags pa'i srad bu nyi rim gyi nang
T02D2590:258a-20: dang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab tu rdo rje'i thig
T02D2590:258a-21: dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2590:258a-22: g-yas phyogs su thig btab nas ye shes kyi thig gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2590:258a-23: de nas yam ram bam ham lam gyi sa bon
T02D2590:258a-24: las rim gyis bskyed pa srad bu bshad pa'i kha
T02D2590:258a-25: dog gi rim gyi pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i
T02D2590:258a-26: tshon rin po cha las byung ba'am /
T02D2590:258a-29: yang na s'a su las byung ba'am /
T02D2590:258a-30: dmar po ni so phag las //
T02D2590:258a-31: nag po ni sol ba las byas pa bzang po la //
T02D2590:258a-32: h'um t'ram a'a: kham aom zhes bya ba las bskyed pa phyag rgya ma lus pa'i gzugs can la /
T02D2590:258a-33: aom badzra tsitra ma ya h'um zhes brjod la /
T02D2590:258a-34: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyi ga yi //
T02D2590:258a-35: mdzub mo rtse mo rab sbyor ba //
T02D2590:258a-36: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad la //
T02D2590:258a-37: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02D2590:258a-38: zhes bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas pas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas mthar yi ge hri bkod de //
T02D2590:258a-39: tshon med po la bden pa gang gis sangs rgyas
T02D2590:258a-40: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad
T02D2590:258a-41: la chags pas chags par mdzad pa'i bden pa des
T02D2590:258a-42: tshon rtsi 'bar bar gyur cig ces byas nas sbar
T02D2590:258a-43: bar bya'o // de nas lte bar gnas pa'i phur bu yi ge h'um gis phyung la /
T02D2590:258b-0: rang @258b gi lag na gnas pa'i rdo rje blos
T02D2590:258b-1: nang du chud par byas nas phur bu'i ga tshon
T02D2590:258b-3: bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi dril bu'i sgra dang /
T02D2590:258b-4: rdo rje glu rnams kyi mtshan ma ngan pa bsal nas /
T02D2590:258b-5: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02D2590:258b-6: sems can khams na grol byed pa /
T02D2590:258b-7: 'jam dbyangs rgyal po rang nyid de //
T02D2590:258b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D2590:258b-10: dang po g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis nang du gnas nas //
T02D2590:258b-11: aom badzra tsitra sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod la dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2590:258b-12: g-yas nas bskor zhing tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste /
T02D2590:258b-14: dang por slob dpon gyis bkye la //
T02D2590:258b-15: phyis ni sgrub pa'i grogs pos te //
T02D2590:258b-16: 'dab ma 'byor ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2590:258b-17: g-yas phyogs nas spom phra ran par dgye bar bya zhing ri mo sgo'i nyi shu char bya'o //
T02D2590:258b-18: spom par dgye bas nas kyis 'debs //
T02D2590:258b-19: phra mos nor ni rnam par 'jig / yon pos rnam 'gras chad pa yis //
T02D2590:258b-20: bla ma dang ni slob ma 'chi //
T02D2590:258b-21: g-yas skor min par dgye ba yis //
T02D2590:258b-22: tshon ni phur bus btab par 'gyur //
T02D2590:258b-23: sngon po rin chen rtse rang bzhin //
T02D2590:258b-24: de bzhin padma r'a ga'i dngos //
T02D2590:258b-25: de la sa gzhan pa kha dog dkar //
T02D2590:258b-26: ma rgad 'char ba lta bu gzhan //
T02D2590:258b-27: ser po nang du shes bya ste /
T02D2590:258b-28: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02D2590:258b-29: shar phyogs su ni sngon po che //
T02D2590:258b-30: lhor ni dmar pos yang dag ldan //
T02D2590:258b-31: zla ba ltar snang nub kyi cha //
T02D2590:258b-32: byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan //
T02D2590:258b-33: dbus ma yi ni sa yi char //
T02D2590:258b-34: gser ltar snang ba bla na med //
T02D2590:258b-35: rdo rje dril bu rtag 'chang zhing //
T02D2590:258b-36: legs mnyam gzhag ste yang dag bri //
T02D2590:258b-37: tshon gyi ri mo rnams kyang gang tsam gyis phan tshun ma 'byar bar dgye bar bya'o //
T02D2590:258b-38: de la phyi'i dkyil 'khor du ni sngon po dang /
T02D2590:258b-42: tshon ser rnams kyis ra ba rnam pa lnga bya'o //
T02D2590:258b-43: gnyis pa ni sngon po dang /
T02D2590:258b-46: 'khor lo gsum par ni dkar po'i ri mo dgye bar bya'o //
T02D2590:258b-47: de nas rdo rje shugs kyis nang du zhugs la /
T02D2590:258b-48: aom badzra be ga aa kra ma h'um /
T02D2590:259a-0: @259a * // yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni //
T02D2590:259a-1: rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung //
T02D2590:259a-2: phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni //
T02D2590:259a-5: ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2590:259a-6: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de /
T02D2590:259a-7: yid kyis kha sbyang bye la /
T02D2590:259a-8: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa dang gcig tu byas nas /
T02D2590:259a-9: rang gi snying po brjod de dkyil 'khor dubs ma'i
T02D2590:259a-10: lte bar bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng
T02D2590:259a-12: shar la sogs pa'i re'u cha la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2590:259a-13: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni spyan la sogs pa'o //
T02D2590:259a-14: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2590:259a-15: byang shar la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni skul byed ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2590:259a-16: rim pa gsum pa'i shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2590:259a-17: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
T02D2590:259a-18: mtshams rnams su mi g-yo ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2590:259a-19: de dag sngar bshad pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D2590:259a-20: phyi'i mtshams dang sgo'i ya phubs rnams la ni /
T02D2590:259a-21: rdo rje rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2590:259a-22: phyogs bzhir ni rta babs rin po che la sogs pa las byas pa /
T02D2590:259a-23: me tog gi phreng ba dang dril bu la sogs pas brgyan par yi ge h'um zlos shing bya'o //
T02D2590:259a-24: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi
T02D2590:259a-25: rol du 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2590:259a-26: phyin pa dang / sdong po bkod pa dang /
T02D2590:259a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba dang /
T02D2590:259a-28: gser 'od dam pa'i mdo bklag par bya'o //
T02D2590:259a-31: tu ru ska la sogs pa'i spos snod phyogs mtshams
T02D2590:259a-32: brgyad du rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gzhag bar
T02D2590:259a-33: bya'o // de nas yi ge h'um bzlas pa'am /
T02D2590:259a-34: bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzlas pa'i spos chus dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' kun du byugs pa //
T02D2590:259a-35: dri zhim po'i me tog gi sil ma ma gtor nas /
T02D2590:259a-36: de nyid bzlas pa'i spos chu nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bsangs la /
T02D2590:259b-0: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab @259b par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2590:259b-1: yi ge brgya pa lan mang du bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2590:259b-2: khro bo brgyad gsungs pas rdo rje sa 'og la sogs pa dgod pa ni /
T02D2590:259b-4: steng dang 'og tu dgod par bya ba nus pa yang ma yin no //
T02D2590:259b-5: de 'ba' zhig brko ba dang yu ba la dbyangs te bya'o zhe na /
T02D2590:259b-6: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D2590:259b-7: mtshan ma tsam nyid yid kyis dgod par bya'i 'di bris pas ci zhig bya ste /
T02D2590:259b-8: bri ba'i cho ga 'di yang yid kyis ma yin te /
T02D2590:259b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ba dag cag
T02D2590:259b-10: rnams 'jug pa ni 'bras bu dang 'dra ba yin
T02D2590:259b-11: pas / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bri ba'i cho
T02D2590:259b-12: ga ni brgyad po nyid dgod par rjes gnang bar
T02D2590:259b-14: spro ba ni yid kyi yin pas bcu po spro
T02D2590:259b-15: bar rigs pa de bzhin du rjes su spyad par
T02D2590:259b-16: bya'i nye bar mtshon par bshad pa'i lhag par dgos
T02D2590:259b-19: gal te bgegs ni byung gyur na /
T02D2590:259b-20: de la gtor ma sbyin la sogs //
T02D2590:259b-21: 'og nas bshad pas bzlog par bya //
T02D2590:259b-22: bgegs ni gzhom par ma nus na /
T02D2590:259b-23: mchod yon phul te gshegs gsol la //
T02D2590:259b-24: nyi ma gzhan la yo byad rnams //
T02D2590:259b-25: legs par bsams te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2590:259b-26: de nas khrus byas shing lus dris bsgos pa dang /
T02D2590:259b-27: kha dri zhim pos bsgos la /
T02D2590:259b-28: me tog gi phreng ba btags shing gos gtsang zhing dri zhim pas stod g-yogs dang /
T02D2590:259b-29: smad g-yogs dang gtsug gtor byas pa rgyan thams cad
T02D2590:259b-30: kyis brgyan pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nga
T02D2590:259b-32: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs te /
T02D2590:259b-33: h'um bzhi pa'i sngags zlos shing rdo rje shugs kyis
T02D2590:259b-34: dkyil 'khor du zhugs la dril bu dkrol zhing bskor
T02D2590:259b-36: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2590:259b-37: dkyil 'khor bltas la phreng bde bcom ldan 'das la phul te /
T02D2590:259b-38: slar yang de gar gyis sbyor bas blangs la /
T02D2590:259b-39: rang gi mgo la h'um bzhis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2590:259b-40: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i nga rgyal du dmigs la /
T02D2590:260a-0: sngar lhag par gnas par byas pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i yi ge h'um bzlas @260a * //
T02D2590:260a-2: srad bu mgul pa bcings la /

T02D2590:260a-4: pos byin gyis brlabs pa me tog dkar po dang
T02D2590:260a-5: dri dkar po'i chus yongs su gang ba me tog
T02D2590:260a-6: gi phreng bas bcings pa la snga ma bzhin du
T02D2590:260a-7: bdag po'i sngags dang yi ge h'um brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2590:260a-8: bzlas pa ; rdo rje sems ma phyag rgyas bzung
T02D2590:260a-9: ba'i me tog gi lcug ma'i rdo rje dang bcas

T02D2590:260a-11: bzlas pa ; dam / stong rtsa brgyad bzlas shing
T02D2590:260a-12: lha thams cad kyi sngags bdun bdun bzlas pa dang
T02D2590:260a-13: bzlas pa ; dam / / gnyis pa las thams cad pa'i bum pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang /
T02D2590:260a-14: yi ge brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing bdud rtsi thab
T02D2590:260a-15: sbyor gyi mtshan mas mtshan pa dang 'jug pa'i sgor
T02D2590:260a-17: chu des bdag nyid dang slob ma 'jug pa'i tshe //
T02D2590:260a-18: dbang bskur ba phyag rgya bcing ba dang 'ching du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2590:260a-19: de las gzhan pa'i bum pa bzhil [?] spyan la

T02D2590:260a-23: de'i mtshan mas mtshan par bya'o //

T02D2590:260a-25: de nas de bzhin du bdag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T02D2590:260a-26: yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas lha
T02D2590:260a-27: thams cad kyi 'khor lo rang gi bdag nyid kyi
T02D2590:260a-28: nang du chud par byas la /
T02D2590:260a-29: de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas til dang nas dang ku sha dang /
T02D2590:260a-30: dri dkar po dang me tog dri zhim po dang /
T02D2590:260a-31: tsandan gyi chu dung chos kyi nang du bcug nas /
T02D2590:260a-32: bdag po'i sngags lan bdun bzla ba dang /
T02D2590:260a-33: dri la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga rang

T02D2590:260a-35: bya'o // de'i dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02D2590:260a-36: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag ste //
T02D2590:260a-37: rdo rje'i sgo nas bzhi po dag / yid kyis rnam par dbye bar bya //

T02D2590:260a-40: so // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo gnyis

T02D2590:260a-42: so // ste / bzlas brjod dang por byas la

T02D2590:260b-0: bya ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor @260b gdeg par bstan

T02D2590:260b-5: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams ni nub la sogs par 'dug ste /
T02D2590:260b-6: de bzhin du g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i gnas pas rim gyis blos dbye bar bya'o //
T02D2590:260b-7: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02D2590:260b-8: bsang gtor gyi bum pa gnas ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2590:260b-9: du gzhag cing de las gzhan pa'i bum pa rnams
T02D2590:260b-10: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams
T02D2590:260b-11: su rim bzhin du gzhag go //
T02D2590:260b-12: de'i phyi rol du bum pa gang ba bzhag la /

T02D2590:260b-15: rim gyis dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'khor lo ma lus pa phyung nas /
T02D2590:260b-16: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i gzugs su bcug la /
T02D2590:260b-17: ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
T02D2590:260b-18: pa rdo rje khro bo'i lcags kyu la sogs pas

T02D2590:260b-20: lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2590:260b-22: phur bu dang ra ba la sogs pa byas pas gnas bsrung ba byas la /

T02D2590:260b-24: pa phul nas sku byin gyis brlab pa sogs pa'i
T02D2590:260b-25: phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /

T02D2590:260b-27: lag pa gnyis kyis khur tshur byas la mdzub mo brkyang ste /
T02D2590:260b-28: mdud pa bya ba ni rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02D2590:260b-29: 'di dang badzra mashti bam zhes bya ba sngags 'dis
T02D2590:260b-30: kyang dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams bcings nas rang gi
T02D2590:260b-31: ting nge 'dzin gyi las la zhugs pa la sgeg
T02D2590:260b-32: mo la sogs pas yang dag pas mchod la /
T02D2590:260b-33: yang dri la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D2590:260b-34: de la ras zung 'bum mam stong ngam brgya'am re re zhing zung re'am /

T02D2590:260b-36: bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang /

T02D2590:261a-10: p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na
T02D2590:261a-11: sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang /

T02D2590:261a-15: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pa 'u dza
T02D2590:261a-16: me gha sa bu dra spha ra na sa ma
T02D2590:261a-17: ye h'um zhes bya ba dang spos snod stong ngam

T02D2590:261a-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta d'i pa p'u dza
T02D2590:261a-25: me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma
T02D2590:261a-26: ye h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:261a-27: mar gyi mar me la sogs pa 'bum phrag brgya dang mar me chen po'i snod brgya'am //
T02D2590:261a-28: mar me chen po bzhi dbul lo //

T02D2590:261a-33: gling bu la sogs pa dbul ba dang /
T02D2590:261a-34: gar mkhan dang zlos gar mkhan gyi gar dang /
T02D2590:261a-37: cod pan la sogs pa dang /
T02D2590:261a-39: ba lang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams dbul bar bya ba dang /
T02D2590:261a-40: rta babs gos bzang po dang /
T02D2590:261a-41: dril bu dang bcas shing rda yab dang bcas pa dang /

T02D2590:261a-52: par nam mkha'i gtos thams cad khyab pa rnams kyis
T02D2590:261a-53: kyang dag par mchod la thal mo sbyar te /

T02D2590:261b-2: grub thams cad kyi don mdzod cig ces gsol ba

T02D2590:261b-4: de // ste / phyi rol du byung ba gtor ma byin nas nye reg bya ste /

T02D2590:261b-7: lag cung zad bkug la mngon du phyogs par bzhag
T02D2590:261b-8: ste / 'di dag mi mra zhing tsog por 'dug la /

T02D2590:261b-16: spyi bor lan gnyis lam gsum reg par bya ba ni nye reg gi cho ba'o //

T02D2590:262a-8: khyed kyi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs shog //

T02D2590:262a-31: slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la //

T02D2590:262a-35: gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi //

T02D2590:262a-37: slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02D2590:262a-38: mi ldog pa yis dbang bskur ba //
T02D2590:262a-39: skal ba chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2590:262a-40: mchan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing //
T02D2590:262a-41: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //

T02D2590:262a-43: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2590:262a-44: dbang bskur chen po rmad byung la //
T02D2590:262a-45: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02D2590:262b-0: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon @262b gyur ;
T02D2590:262b-1: / slob dpon po bdag la stsol //
T02D2590:262b-2: de nas slob dpon gyis rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste //
T02D2590:262b-3: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
T02D2590:262b-4: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
T02D2590:262b-5: dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi //
T02D2590:262b-7: de nas slob dpon gyis yang 'di skad brjod par bya ste //
T02D2590:262b-8: gsang ba chen po'i rigs bdag pa //
T02D2590:262b-9: gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni //
T02D2590:262b-10: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02D2590:262b-11: des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2590:262b-12: yang slob don gyis 'di skad ces bya ste /
T02D2590:262b-13: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2590:262b-14: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02D2590:262b-15: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02D2590:262b-16: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02D2590:262b-17: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag / blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02D2590:262b-18: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02D2590:262b-19: shes rab dril bu zhes bsgrags so //

T02D2590:262b-35: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya //

T02D2590:262b-44: khyod kyis srog chags gsang mi bya //

T02D2590:262b-48: phung krol kun gyi rtsa ba yi //

T02D2590:263a-2: dam pa nye bar brten bya zhing //
T02D2590:263a-3: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D2590:263a-4: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02D2590:263a-5: dag gis rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02D2590:263a-6: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag gnyi //

T02D2590:263a-8: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya ;
T02D2590:263a-9: / sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02D2590:263a-10: 'khor ba dag kyang yang mi spong //
T02D2590:263a-11: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02D2590:263a-12: lha dang lha min gsang ba la //
T02D2590:263a-13: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02D2590:263a-14: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon bya dang //

T02D2590:263a-17: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //

T02D2590:263a-22: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2590:263a-23: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
