T02D2590:263a-25: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2590:263a-26: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2590:263a-27: gang zhig sngom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de la /
T02D2590:263a-28: deng khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste /
T02D2590:263a-29: slob dpon du rjes su gnang ba dang dbang bskur bar yang mi bya'i /
T02D2590:263a-30: 'jug pa tsam zhig byed du gzhug go //
T02D2590:263a-31: de nas khrus byas shing dri bzang po la sogs pas kyang brgyan la /
T02D2590:263a-32: yi ge h'um bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang /
T02D2590:263a-35: aom sarbba yo ga tsi tta autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:263a-36: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2590:263a-37: dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su //
T02D2590:263a-38: de yi snying gar snying pos ni //
T02D2590:263a-39: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02D2590:263a-40: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho:siddha badzra ya th'a su kham /

T02D2590:263a-42: gyis brlabs par gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D2590:263a-45: la smra bar ma byed cig / dad pa mi

T02D2590:263b-0: slob ma de la dri la sogs pas mchod @263b

T02D2590:263b-12: bzlas pa nyid kyis sgor gnas par byas la //

T02D2590:268b-1: slar yang byang chub yan lag bsags //
T02D2590:268b-2: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yi //
T02D2590:268b-4: bh'um rdo rje chos ltar rang nyid kyis //
T02D2590:268b-5: chos kyi me ni legs sbar la //
T02D2590:268b-6: ma rig ldongs byas sems can rnams //
T02D2590:268b-7: ye shes snang bas bsal bar gyis //
T02D2590:268b-8: pum rgyal ba khyod kyis dril phul bas //
T02D2590:268b-9: lus can rnams la byang chub bskor //
T02D2590:268b-10: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang /
T02D2590:268b-11: rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yin //
T02D2590:268b-12: ga: de nas bdag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas gser gyi thur ma bzlas pa blangs la /
T02D2590:268b-13: mdun du 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2590:268b-14: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D2590:268b-15: 'jig rten lung tog bsam la ltar //
T02D2590:268b-16: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02D2590:268b-17: rab ri ba rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D2590:268b-18: aom badzra ne tra aa pa ha ra ti mi
T02D2590:268b-19: ram hri: slob ma'i mig gnyis su yi ge pra
T02D2590:268b-21: de nas me long bstan la /
T02D2590:268b-22: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02D2590:268b-23: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D2590:268b-24: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D2590:268b-25: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D2590:268b-26: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02D2590:268b-27: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02D2590:268b-28: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02D2590:268b-29: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D2590:268b-30: 'on kyang snags rgyas sras su skyes //
T02D2590:268b-31: de nas dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las byung a'i dril bu dkrol la byin te /
T02D2590:268b-32: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2590:268b-33: nam mkha' la yang mtshan yid med //
T02D2590:268b-34: nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis //
T02D2590:268b-35: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02D2590:268b-36: de nas yi ge hos gzhu byin la //
T02D2590:268b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de //
T02D2590:268b-39: phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phang bar bya'o //
T02D2590:268b-42: yang aa:badzra stva zhes bya ba 'dis me long blangs la //
T02D2590:268b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02D2590:268b-44: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D2590:268b-45: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni //
T02D2590:268b-46: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02D2590:268b-47: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
T02D2590:268b-48: por byang chub kyi sems ni 'di yin par shes
T02D2590:269a-0: par gyis shig ces brjod par @269a * //
T02D2590:269a-2: de nas aom badzra he tu mam zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:269a-3: rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du chos kyi 'khor lo gzhag //
T02D2590:269a-4: aom badzra bha sha ram zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2590:269a-5: lag pa g-yas su dung dbyangs kyi yi ge dang pos lag pa g-yon du glegs bam dang /
T02D2590:269a-6: dbyangs kyi yi ge tha mas dril bu byin la //
T02D2590:269a-7: de nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos
T02D2590:269a-8: kyi 'khor lo bskor cig / de ring phan cad
T02D2590:269a-9: 'jig rten la // skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2590:269a-10: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02D2590:269a-11: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis /
T02D2590:269a-12: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02D2590:269a-13: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02D2590:269a-14: gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog //
T02D2590:269a-16: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02D2590:269a-17: phan thogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02D2590:269a-18: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang //
T02D2590:269a-19: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02D2590:269a-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor los
T02D2590:269a-21: sgyur ba'i sbyor ba ji lta ba dang ldan pas
T02D2590:269a-22: // 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02D2590:269a-23: sems cad kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2590:269a-25: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2590:269a-26: de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02D2590:269a-29: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gang ba byin la //
T02D2590:269a-31: phyag rgya chen po rgyur gyur da sa sangs rgyas
T02D2590:269a-32: thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor bas snying gar
T02D2590:269a-33: g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis chos
T02D2590:269a-34: gos kyi tha ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la
T02D2590:269a-35: g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa la /
T02D2590:269a-36: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D2590:269a-38: by'a ka ro mi tvam badzra sa tva ta th'a
T02D2590:269a-39: ga ta bha ba dur ga ti to dhi ty'a
T02D2590:269a-40: nta bha ba siddha ye he badzra n'a ma ta
T02D2590:269a-41: th'a ga ta siddha sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2590:269a-42: bhur bhu ba sv'a: gang la gzengs bstod pa d'i dang /
T02D2590:269a-43: phyag rgya chen pos lung bstan pa mchog tu gsang
T02D2590:269a-44: ba'i cho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems
T02D2590:269a-45: dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2590:269a-46: dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang byang
T02D2590:269a-47: chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i
T02D2590:269a-48: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi dam tshig
T02D2590:269a-49: slob dpon la mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa
T02D2590:269a-50: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston
T02D2590:269a-51: dang / par mdzad do // 'di lta ste /
T02D2590:269a-52: gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid dang phyag rgya chen pos
T02D2590:269b-0: mchog tu gsang @269b ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyi
T02D2590:269b-2: gsang sngags kyi stobs la dad par bya'o zhes slob ma rnams la brjod par bya'o //
T02D2590:269b-3: de nas dkyil 'khor du gsang ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D2590:269b-4: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02D2590:269b-5: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02D2590:269b-6: de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02D2590:269b-7: khyod kyis kyang ni ma byed cig / ma h'a sa ma ya ha na phat //
T02D2590:269b-8: de'i 'og tu rnag gi lag pa g-yon pas slob ma'i mthe bo g-yas pa bzung la /
T02D2590:269b-9: slob ma'i gtso bo la dmigs nas mar gyi sreg blugs bya ba dang /
T02D2590:269b-10: sbrang rtsi dang mar dang zho dang bsres pa'i til gyi sreg blugs brgya byas la ;
T02D2590:269b-11: bsang gtor byas te snying gar byugs la las thams cad pa dang //
T02D2590:269b-12: rigs kyi snying po bzlas pa'i srung skud dang /
T02D2590:269b-13: gdu bu lag ngar du gdags par bya'o //
T02D2590:269b-14: de nas de'i mgo bor gdugs bzhag la /
T02D2590:269b-15: skor ba byed du bcug ste /
T02D2590:269b-16: thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas par dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2590:269b-17: sgor gdugs dang bcas par lus phab la 'di skad
T02D2590:269b-19: slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
T02D2590:269b-21: gdugs bzhag nas ni slob dpon gyis //
T02D2590:269b-22: snying la 'bab pa de la brjod //
T02D2590:269b-23: da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gur //
T02D2590:269b-25: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2590:269b-26: lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
T02D2590:269b-27: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02D2590:269b-28: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02D2590:269b-29: nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis //
T02D2590:269b-30: sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor / de nas
T02D2590:269b-31: rang nyid kyis lan brgya bzlas pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D2590:269b-32: sngags phyag rgya dang ldan par slob ma la byin
T02D2590:269b-33: la / bcom ldan 'di la stsal lags kyis //
T02D2590:269b-35: bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis //
T02D2590:269b-36: bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D2590:269b-37: zhes rim bzhin du slob dpon dang slob ma dag gis sngags bskur la smra bas byin la //
T02D2590:269b-38: dkyil 'khor du bzlas la lha rnams kyi phyag rgya bzhi yang bslabs la /
T02D2590:269b-39: khyod kyis gzhan phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gang
T02D2590:269b-40: la yang phyag rgya rnams ston par ma byed cig
T02D2590:269b-42: 'di ltar sems can de rnams ni dkyil 'khor ma
T02D2590:269b-43: mthong par phyag rgya bcing ba la rab tu sbyor
T02D2590:270a-1: 'bras bu ma thob pa dang som nyir gyur nas
T02D2590:270a-2: ya nga ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas dmyal
T02D2590:270a-4: rgyu des na ji ltar zhugs pa rnams la de
T02D2590:270a-5: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2590:270a-6: dbugs dbyung pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2590:270a-7: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni ;
T02D2590:270a-8: / mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas //
T02D2590:270a-9: sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing //
T02D2590:270a-10: khyed rnams de nyid legs par gnas //
T02D2590:270a-11: bde chen thog pa 'di las ni //
T02D2590:270a-12: slar 'chi ba ni yod min te //
T02D2590:270a-13: mi shigs pa dang mi sod pas //
T02D2590:270a-14: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02D2590:270a-15: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod bton //
T02D2590:270a-16: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2590:270a-17: ston pa mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02D2590:270a-18: dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di //
T02D2590:270a-19: rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02D2590:270a-20: sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
T02D2590:270a-21: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2590:270a-22: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i //
T02D2590:270a-23: byang chub sems kyang gtang mi bya //
T02D2590:270a-24: phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa'i //
T02D2590:270a-25: de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis //
T02D2590:270a-26: srog dang rus pa la bab kyang //
T02D2590:270a-27: dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems //
T02D2590:270a-28: slob dpon dag kyang brnyas mi bya //
T02D2590:270a-29: gdug la byams dang chags bral bar //
T02D2590:270a-30: nam yang bya ba ma yin no //
T02D2590:270a-31: de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D2590:270a-32: khyod ni dmyal ba'i me nang 'dor ;
T02D2590:270a-33: / bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su //
T02D2590:270a-34: dka' thub kyis kyang ma gsungs shig / ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung //
T02D2590:270a-35: 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2590:270a-36: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2590:270a-37: nam yang yongs su mi dor zhing //
T02D2590:270a-38: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste /
T02D2590:270a-40: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi //
T02D2590:270a-41: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
T02D2590:270a-42: de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas //
T02D2590:270a-43: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te //
T02D2590:270a-44: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad //
T02D2590:270a-45: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtsos pa dang /
T02D2590:270a-46: gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis /
T02D2590:270a-47: bsad nas sems can dmyal ltung 'gyur //
T02D2590:270a-48: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
T02D2590:270a-49: rdo rje slob dpon slob gros che //
T02D2590:270a-50: dge la rab tu mi spyom pa //
T02D2590:270a-51: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2590:270a-52: bla ma la ni gus bcas yod //
T02D2590:270a-53: rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya //
T02D2590:270a-54: des na rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
T02D2590:270b-0: rang gi dam @270b tshig slob dpon ni //
T02D2590:270b-1: sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang //
T02D2590:270b-2: rang srog gis rtag bsten bya na //
T02D2590:270b-3: longs spyod g-yo ba smos ci dgos //
T02D2590:270b-4: gang phyir bskal ba byed par ni //
T02D2590:270b-5: grangs med par rnyed dka' ba yi //
T02D2590:270b-6: sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la //
T02D2590:270b-7: tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed //
T02D2590:270b-8: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsung //
T02D2590:270b-9: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02D2590:270b-10: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul //
T02D2590:270b-12: de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02D2590:270b-13: rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2590:270b-14: de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te //
T02D2590:270b-15: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2590:270b-16: slob dpon gyi ni yon tan bzung //
T02D2590:270b-17: skyon rnams nams kyang ma yin no //
T02D2590:270b-18: yon tan bzung bas dngos grub cing //
T02D2590:270b-19: skyon rnams kyi sa ni dngos grub nyams //
T02D2590:270b-20: de yi grib ma 'gom pa ni //
T02D2590:270b-21: mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs //
T02D2590:270b-22: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i gsangs ba pa //
T02D2590:270b-23: dam pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur //
T02D2590:270b-24: slob dpon smong [*smod] par byed pa dag //
T02D2590:270b-25: rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya //
T02D2590:270b-26: slob dpon smad pa gang yin te /
T02D2590:270b-27: bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis gzung//
T02D2590:270b-28: gtum po'i las byed ngan pa'i bdag / mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya //
T02D2590:270b-29: mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i //
T02D2590:270b-30: dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa //
T02D2590:270b-31: der ni slob dpon smad byed pa //
T02D2590:270b-32: gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs //
T02D2590:270b-33: de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te //
T02D2590:270b-34: bsam yas 'bras bu sbyin byed pa //
T02D2590:270b-36: sems can dad pas de mchod cig / gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas //
T02D2590:270b-37: deng khod skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2590:270b-38: dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam par //
T02D2590:270b-39: deng khyod gyur par the tshom med //
T02D2590:270b-40: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa //
T02D2590:270b-41: kun gyi deng khyod dbang bskur bas //
T02D2590:270b-42: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che //
T02D2590:270b-43: rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa yin //
T02D2590:270b-44: deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
T02D2590:270b-45: dgong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs //
T02D2590:270b-46: khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D2590:270b-47: deng 'dir thob par the tshom med //
T02D2590:270b-48: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis //
T02D2590:270b-49: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02D2590:270b-51: sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig / de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis //
T02D2590:270b-52: rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde bskyed bsten par gyis //
T02D2590:271a-2: rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2590:271a-3: slob ma rab dang mnyes gshin pas //
T02D2590:271a-4: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2590:271a-5: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba //
T02D2590:271a-6: de bzhin bdag ni bgyid ces brjod //
T02D2590:271a-7: de ltar na mdor bsdus pa dang bar ma dang
T02D2590:271a-8: rgya che ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dbye ba ni 'dir
T02D2590:271a-9: ma thos te / yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga gcig pu nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2590:271a-10: de ltar na yang mkhan po'i zhal snga nas kyis
T02D2590:271a-11: mdzad pa'i 'phags pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2590:271a-12: chen po'i cho ga'i rim pa rjes su 'brangs nas
T02D2590:271a-13: gsum du bya bar 'dod par bya'o //
T02D2590:271a-14: spyi'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2590:271a-15: gzhan yang dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i slob ma la /
T02D2590:271a-16: de bzhin du khrus dang gos dang rgyan la sogs
T02D2590:271a-17: pas brgyan la dam tshig gsum sbyin pa'i mthar thug
T02D2590:271a-19: dkyil 'khor du mngon par phyogs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag la /
T02D2590:271a-20: slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2590:271a-21: lha'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2590:271a-22: slob dpon gyi las rnams bshad par bya ste /
T02D2590:271a-23: de nyid de'i slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i gnas yin no //
T02D2590:271a-24: 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba yin par gsungs so //
T02D2590:271a-25: de nas tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba byin la /
T02D2590:271a-26: gzengs bstod pas lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D2590:271a-27: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ni 'di yin te /
T02D2590:271a-28: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhir mnyam //
T02D2590:271a-29: dran dang dbang pos sgo bzhi ste //
T02D2590:271a-30: bsam gtan rnams kyis rta babs bzhi //
T02D2590:271a-31: ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya //
T02D2590:271a-32: khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje mchog / gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin //
T02D2590:271a-33: rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yang //
T02D2590:271a-34: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02D2590:271a-35: gdul bas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dam chos sgra ni kun 'gro ba //
T02D2590:271a-36: rlung gis bskyod pa'i sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yin //
T02D2590:271a-37: me long ye shes btags me tog / byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02D2590:271a-38: dra ba me long btags me tog / me tog chun 'phyang rgyan gyis bskor //
T02D2590:271a-39: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02D2590:271a-40: bde ba chen po zhes bshad de //
T02D2590:271a-41: de yi nang gi 'khor lo de //
T02D2590:271a-43: dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i //
T02D2590:271a-44: rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin //
T02D2590:271a-45: byang chub sems ni theg pa che //
T02D2590:271b-0: mdo sde 'khor lo @271b rab bskor bas //
T02D2590:271b-1: rdo rje'i thig gis yongs ba skor ba'i //
T02D2590:271b-2: rdo rje 'khor lo yin par bshad //
T02D2590:271b-3: 'gro la ye shes kyi chags pas //
T02D2590:271b-4: tshon ni rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga yin //
T02D2590:271b-5: dbang po'i don ni rnam dag pa //
T02D2590:271b-6: rang gi mtshan nyid rab dbye nyid //
T02D2590:271b-7: shes rab ye shes bdud rtsi 'thung //
T02D2590:271b-8: rdo rje can gyi bum pa de //
T02D2590:271b-9: tshogs rdzogs pa yi rgyu mthun zhing //
T02D2590:271b-10: thugs rje'i rlan ldan bum pa gang //
T02D2590:271b-11: dkyil 'khor gang du me tog spos //
T02D2590:271b-12: mar me ched dang drir bshad pa //
T02D2590:271b-13: byang chub yan lag yid rab tshim //
T02D2590:271b-14: chos kyi snang grags tshogs bsdus yin //
T02D2590:271b-15: chos kyi zas ni lha bshos te //
T02D2590:271b-16: ngo tsha khrel yod pa yang gos //
T02D2590:271b-17: glu dang gar dang rol mo mchog / bde ba chen po'i 'phel byed yin //
T02D2590:271b-18: grong khyer thar pa'i grong khyer pas //
T02D2590:271b-19: dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa yin //
T02D2590:271b-20: de ltar spros pas mdzes pa ni //
T02D2590:271b-21: pha rol phyin sogs 'bras bu yin //
T02D2590:271b-22: lha'i de kho na nyid kyang dpal 'jam pa'i rdo
T02D2590:271b-23: rje ni shes rab kyi ye shes snang bar mdzad
T02D2590:271b-24: pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2590:271b-25: slob dpon gyi ni las rnams kyang //
T02D2590:271b-26: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02D2590:271b-27: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni //
T02D2590:271b-28: cho ga bzhin bcings zhugs nas kyang //
T02D2590:271b-29: spho ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi //
T02D2590:271b-30: de la thams cad dbab pa'i snying po ni 'di lags so //
T02D2590:271b-31: aa: bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs //
T02D2590:271b-32: ji lta bar ni bka' mnod do //
T02D2590:271b-33: de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod //
T02D2590:271b-34: de nas rdo rje bsgrub par bgyi //
T02D2590:271b-35: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02D2590:271b-36: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02D2590:271b-37: se gol mang po brdab bgyis la //
T02D2590:271b-38: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu thar bgyi //
T02D2590:271b-39: de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02D2590:271b-40: rdo rje sems la sogs bcas pa //
T02D2590:271b-41: dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //
T02D2590:271b-43: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D2590:271b-44: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02D2590:271b-45: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02D2590:271b-46: lan cig bar du brjod par bgyi //
T02D2590:271b-47: de nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na //
T02D2590:271b-48: de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par 'gyur //
T02D2590:271b-49: rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa //
T02D2590:271b-50: grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas //
T02D2590:271b-51: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02D2590:271b-52: lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas //
T02D2590:271b-53: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02D2590:271b-54: dam tshig rnams ni bzhag par bgyi //
T02D2590:271b-55: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2590:271b-56: sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02D2590:272a-0: de ltar byang chub chen po @272a * //
T02D2590:272a-2: / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing //
T02D2590:272a-3: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa //
T02D2590:272a-4: sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar //
T02D2590:272a-5: spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bzhugs //
T02D2590:272a-6: bcings nas de yi dbang du 'gyur //
T02D2590:272a-7: de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams //
T02D2590:272a-8: gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la //
T02D2590:272a-9: sems can don kun bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2590:272a-10: thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi //
T02D2590:272a-11: 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2590:272a-12: slob ma gzhan dag ni ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste /
T02D2590:272a-13: dkyil 'khor bstan pa rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D2590:272a-14: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas kyang rang
T02D2590:272a-15: gi lhag pa'i lhar byin gyis brlabs la phyag rgya
T02D2590:272a-16: chen pos sngar bshad pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D2590:272a-17: bzhag ste / spos la sogs pas mchod yon sbyin te /
T02D2590:272a-19: de nas phyag rgya cod pan dar dbyangs dang /
T02D2590:272a-20: rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02D2590:272a-21: ming gi dbang bskur la sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2590:272a-22: sngags byin la rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi snga
T02D2590:272a-23: ma bzhin bstan nas slob ma re re nas bzung
T02D2590:272a-24: ste / blugs gzar gyis de rnams kyi spyi bo nas bskor zhing phab ste /
T02D2590:272a-25: dgang blugs bdun phul la bsang zhing bya bas la lag par gdu bu gdags par bya'o //
T02D2590:272a-26: 'di ni thun mong gi 'jug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2590:272a-27: de nas dri la sogs pa dang /
T02D2590:272a-28: sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang dkyil 'khor pa rnams
T02D2590:272a-29: yang dag par mchod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2590:272a-30: cad la ci nus par mchod cig ces slob ma
T02D2590:272a-32: mchod pa byed du bcug nas ji ltar zhugs pa
T02D2590:272a-33: rnams yang bza' ba dang btung ba spyod pa la
T02D2590:272a-35: mgon po la phul ba rnams kyis kun du tshim par byas nas /
T02D2590:272a-36: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D2590:272a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs byin la /
T02D2590:272a-38: de rnams dang lhan cig mtshan mo nyal bar bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas la /
T02D2590:272a-39: yang su la yang smra bar mi byed cig thams
T02D2590:272a-40: cad la bsgo la bla mas yon blang bar bya'o
T02D2590:272a-41: ; / de nas chung ma sdug pa dang //
T02D2590:272a-42: rin chen gser ni 'bar ba dang //
T02D2590:272a-43: nor bu mu tig byu ru dang //
T02D2590:272a-44: lus kyang sbyin par bya ba yin //
T02D2590:272a-45: slob mas bla ma la gus pas //
T02D2590:272a-46: ci nas 'di ltar bya ba ste //
T02D2590:272a-47: ji ltar bla ma mgu bar bya //
T02D2590:272a-48: bla ma mgu bas dngos grub kyi //
T02D2590:272a-49: gzhan du min zhes thub pas gsungs //
T02D2590:272b-0: de nas bzhin @272b bzangs longs la /
T02D2590:272b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ci rigs pa rdzogs par gyis la /
T02D2590:272b-2: gang gis ring po mi thogs pa kho nar lha
T02D2590:272b-3: dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ba
T02D2590:272b-4: de ltar gyis shig ces snying la 'bab pa'i tshig
T02D2590:272b-5: brjod la slob ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02D2590:272b-6: de nas me thab kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das
T02D2590:272b-7: dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag po dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D2590:272b-9: rgyas pa'i cho gas mar gyi dgang blugs brgya phul la /
T02D2590:272b-10: zhi ba'i cho gas kyang mar gyi dgang blugs brgya phul te /
T02D2590:272b-11: yang dag par bstod la mchod pa thams cad kyis
T02D2590:272b-12: yang dag par mchod de phyogs kyi gtor ma byin
T02D2590:272b-14: mchod yon phul la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
T02D2590:272b-15: bsngos te snga ma bzhin du phyag rgya dgrol ba
T02D2590:272b-16: la sogs pa rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings
T02D2590:272b-17: la dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
T02D2590:272b-18: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol la //
T02D2590:272b-19: ji ltar sprul pa'i tshogs kyang rang gi lus kyi nang du chud par byas la /
T02D2590:272b-20: aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dha rmm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta ces brod la //
T02D2590:272b-21: de'i don la lhag par mos shing yi ge h'um dang dkyil 'khor phyag par bya'o //
T02D2590:272b-22: 'bad pas tshon rtsi bsdus nas ni //
T02D2590:272b-23: chu chen dag tu dor bar bya //
T02D2590:272b-24: dor nas kyang ni sa gzhi ni //
T02D2590:272b-25: ba yi lci bas byug par bya //
T02D2590:272b-26: de nas aom badzra k'i lo ta k'i la ya sarbba k'i l'am /
T02D2590:272b-27: buddha saddhya na badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a ya h'um
T02D2590:272b-28: h'um h'um zhes bya ba'i rdo rje phur ba'i sngags
T02D2590:272b-29: kyi bsam gtan las byung ba'i phur bu phyung la
T02D2590:272b-30: seng ldeng las byung ba'i phur bu zhi ba'i rig
T02D2590:272b-31: pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o ma'am spos chus
T02D2590:272b-32: bkrus nas bu ga yang dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2590:272b-33: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs /
T02D2590:272b-34: mdzub mo gnyis zlum por byas te /
T02D2590:272b-35: lag ngar brkyang la skam pa lta bur bya ba ni /
T02D2590:272b-36: phur bu dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2590:272b-37: de nas bdag nyid dang slob ma dang /
T02D2590:272b-39: sems can thams cad la dmigs te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2590:272b-40: dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad rnams //
T02D2590:272b-41: thams cad slob dpon dbang bar bshad //
T02D2590:272b-42: slob mas cung zad bskur mi bya //
T02D2590:272b-43: gal te khyer na dam tshig nyams //
T02D2590:272b-44: slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs par //
T02D2590:272b-45: bdag nyid 'dod pas spyad par bya //
T02D2590:272b-46: zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal sgyu 'phrul dra bas gsungs so //
T02D2590:272b-47: thams cad du yang dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2590:273a-0: sbyin sreg la sogs pa rtsom pa @273a * //
T02D2590:273a-2: gang gi tshe slob dpon gyi phyi rol du 'gro na /
T02D2590:273a-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa gshin rje gshed
T02D2590:273a-4: sngar bshad pa'i rang gi ngo bor rang gi snying
T02D2590:273a-5: gnas rang gi sa bon las nges par byung ba
T02D2590:273a-6: / gdug pa'i bgegs ma lus pa 'dul ba la
T02D2590:273a-7: 'jug pa lha dang mi ma dang pa rnams dang
T02D2590:273a-8: / par mdzad pa / dang ba rnams slar yang 'phel bar mdzad pa ste /
T02D2590:273a-9: mdor na de ni sems can thams cad kyi mngon par mi 'dod pa zlog par mdzad cing /
T02D2590:273a-10: mngon par 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad pa /
T02D2590:273a-11: ma tshang ba'i nyes pa rnams sel bar mdzad pa /
T02D2590:273a-12: khro bo mtha' yas pas kun du bskor ba h'a h'a zhes bzhad pas ri bo chen po dang /
T02D2590:273a-13: rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor 'khrugs par mdzad pas /
T02D2590:273a-14: nam mkha'i gtos thams cad khyab par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2590:273a-15: de lta bu ni gang gi tshe slob dpon nang
T02D2590:273a-16: na gnas pa de'i tshe phyi rol na bzhugs par
T02D2590:273a-17: bsam par bya'o // bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o //
T02D2590:273a-18: snga ma bzhin du bdag po'i sbyor ba 'di nyid
T02D2590:273a-19: dang ldan pas sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga
T02D2590:273a-20: la sogs pa thams cad nas dbang bskur ba dang
T02D2590:273a-21: / slob ma slar btang ba dang /
T02D2590:273a-22: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi bar du yid kyis byas te /
T02D2590:273a-23: yid kyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgya cher bya'o //
T02D2590:273a-24: yang na de bzhin du bdag po'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2590:273a-25: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsreg pa sngon du 'gro ba dang ;
T02D2590:273a-26: gzhal yas khang bskyed la de'i nang du zla ba
T02D2590:273a-27: dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan ci rigs par
T02D2590:273a-28: padma la gnas par bsams la /
T02D2590:273a-29: slob ma me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i mes thal bar byas la /
T02D2590:273a-30: rang gi sngags kyi bdag nyid can du sna bug g-yas pa nas bcug ste /
T02D2590:273a-31: rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge las bskyed pa /
T02D2590:273a-32: sna bug cig shos nas phyung ste /
T02D2590:273a-33: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma la gzhag ste /
T02D2590:273a-34: sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la bdag po'i
T02D2590:273a-35: sbyor bas gnas par rang gi phyag rgya'i rig pa
T02D2590:273a-36: dang gnyis su med par gyur pa rang gi snying
T02D2590:273a-37: ga'i rdo rje lte ba la gnas pa'i yi ge
T02D2590:273a-38: h'um yongs su gyur pa dang /
T02D2590:273a-39: dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'khor lo ma lus par bsams
T02D2590:273a-40: la mthar rang gi phyag rgya'i bde ba chen po'i
T02D2590:273a-41: mer yang dag par zhugs pas /
T02D2590:273a-42: de nyid zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs kyis phyung la /
T02D2590:273a-43: gnas ji lta ba na gnas pa'i lha ma lus
T02D2590:273b-0: pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing dkyil @273b 'khor
T02D2590:273b-1: gyi bdag po'i sbyor bas gnas pa la snga ma
T02D2590:273b-2: bzhin du yi ge gsum gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2590:273b-3: h'um las byung ba'i lha mo bzhi bde ba chen pos byin gyis brlab pa snying po dang /
T02D2590:273b-4: yon blang ba sngon du 'gro bas sangs rgyas thams
T02D2590:273b-5: cad kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du nam mkha'i
T02D2590:273b-6: ngos kun du bkang nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha
T02D2590:273b-7: mo rnams nang du zhugs pas bde ba chen po'i
T02D2590:273b-8: ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2590:273b-9: rang bzhin gyi bum pa phyag na bsnams kyis spyi
T02D2590:273b-11: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D2590:273b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D2590:273b-13: snying po brjod cing dbang bskur te /
T02D2590:273b-14: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis nyes pa thams cad dang bral zhing /
T02D2590:273b-15: gos la sogs pas brgyan pa'i cod pan gyi dbang
T02D2590:273b-16: bskur ba sngon du 'gro ba'i glu rnams kyis yang
T02D2590:273b-17: dag par dga' bar byas la /
T02D2590:273b-18: snga ma bzhin du dam tshig sbyin pa la sogs pa rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2590:273b-19: 'di ni re zhig gzhan gyi dbang bskur ba bdag
T02D2590:273b-20: nyid kyang bdag po'i sbyor bas rang gi rig pa
T02D2590:273b-21: dang gnyis su med par gyur bas 'di lta bu'i
T02D2590:273b-22: dbang bskur ba nyid blang bar bya ste /
T02D2590:273b-23: 'di yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ste /
T02D2590:273b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sngags pa dbang
T02D2590:273b-25: bskur ba thams cad kyang mchog / dngos grub dam
T02D2590:273b-26: pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin no //
T02D2590:273b-27: yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das mngon par bzhed pa kho na ste /
T02D2590:273b-28: ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2590:273b-29: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba 'dus
T02D2590:273b-30: par dbang bskur ba'i bcom ldan 'das slob dpon la
T02D2590:273b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2590:273b-32: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji lta ba
T02D2590:273b-33: lta bar bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs
T02D2590:273b-34: pa 'di lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2590:273b-35: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang /
T02D2590:273b-36: thugs rdo rje'i 'dus pas 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2590:273b-37: gyi gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni 'di yid kyi
T02D2590:273b-38: nyid yin te / so so'i skye bo rnams kyis phyi'i med pa dang /
T02D2590:273b-39: de'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
T02D2590:273b-40: de bas na 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gyi le'u las
T02D2590:273b-41: til gyi gang bu ltar kun du gang ba'i rgyal
T02D2590:273b-42: ba'i bum pa'i chu dang dbang bskur bar mdzad par
T02D2590:274a-0: @274a * // dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang 'dra'o zhes ji skad du gsungs pa dang /
T02D2590:274a-1: de bzhin du dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa
T02D2590:274a-2: las kyang rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2590:274a-3: gsungs nas / phyag rgya gcig pu'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shing /
T02D2590:274a-4: de nyid ras dang rtsig pa dang /
T02D2590:274a-5: nam mkha'i phyogs su yang bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs
T02D2590:274a-6: pas de yang dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa
T02D2590:274a-7: thams cad du dbar bskur ba yid kyi nyid rjes
T02D2590:274a-8: su gnang ba kho na yin no //
T02D2590:274a-9: dkyil 'khor thams cad bshad pa khyad par med pa dang /
T02D2590:274a-10: bstan pa des khyad par ci zhig yod de /
T02D2590:274a-11: gal te phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin
T02D2590:274a-12: gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa ni ma
T02D2590:274a-13: yin no // de ci'i phyir phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor yid kyi yin gyi //
T02D2590:274a-14: dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa ni ma yin
T02D2590:274a-15: no zhes la la zer ba de ni mi rigs
T02D2590:274a-16: so // bdag cig gi slob dpon rnams kyis kyang
T02D2590:274a-17: gal te 'dul ba'i dbang gis gzhan dag la 'di
T02D2590:274a-18: skad du gsungs kyi yang dag par ma yin te
T02D2590:274a-19: so // // ji ltar dbang bskur ba 'di ni
T02D2590:274a-20: mi sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pa de
T02D2590:274a-21: bzhin du cho ga gzhan dag kyang ci'i phyir mi
T02D2590:274a-22: so // // 'dod de / khyad par med pa yin no //
T02D2590:274a-23: yid mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phyir rtsam pa 'di dag thams cad de bri ba'i cho ga yang /
T02D2590:274a-24: ji srid yid kyi cho ga rjes su ma spyad
T02D2590:274a-25: pa de srid 'bras bu dang ldan par mi 'gyur
T02D2590:274a-26: ro // de lta bas na yid kyi cho ga 'di stobs can yin pa'i phyir mchog yin gyi /
T02D2590:274a-28: yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o /
T02D2590:274a-31: // / de ltar gnyi gas kyang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas la /
T02D2590:274a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchod par bshad pa /
T02D2590:274a-33: nam mkha' dri ma med pa chos thams cad kyi
T02D2590:274a-34: de bzhin nyid kyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par
T02D2590:274a-35: bya'o // 'jig rten gsum la bde phan bsgrub par brtson pa yis //
T02D2590:274a-36: bdag gis cho ga 'di bshad dge thob gang yin pa //
T02D2590:274a-37: des ni 'gro ba kun dang bdag gis 'di nyid kyi //
T02D2590:274a-38: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mngon sum gyur ba myur thob
T02D2590:274a-39: shog / sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed
